1.content:
Dennis walked into the downtown pawn shop near his college apartment. Guitars lined the back and the owner was disappointed when Dennis said he wasn’t interested in a guitar, but a digital camera instead.

Dennis pointed at one and the clerk pulled it down and placed it on the counter. Dennis looked it over and asked what the owner thought about the camera. The owner rubbed his chin.

“The camera looks OK, but when the owner pawned it a while ago, he told me not to resell it because the camera was cursed.”

They both laughed. Dennis then sighed, ready for the bad news he expected. “OK, how much?”

The owner smiled. “Well, even though he asked me not to resell it, he hasn’t been back since. So since I’m in a good mood, how about $50?”

Dennis smiled and handed over the cash. There was no cord to download, but it had a blank card it in. Dennis looked at the clerk one last time.

“Any instructions? You know, to avoid the curse?”

The clerk shook his head. “The owner said the camera took perfect pictures, but that perfection isn’t always what it’s cracked up to be.”

Dennis shrugged his shoulders and left. He was happy to have a nice camera that wasn’t included on his phone. He couldn’t wait to try it out. Walking out, Dennis headed toward.

"Hey, check it out" Dennis said as he placed the camera down on the desk.

"Wow" Greg responded in a deadpan manner, "A digital camera. Welcome to the early 21st century."

"The pawn shop owner said it's supposed to take perfect pictures".

"Well, you need all the help you can get. Most of the time they look like those fuzzy UFO sighting pictures that are on the front of the Enquirer" Greg said.

There's a knock on the door. "Luigi's pizza!"

"Really? Again?" Dennis asked as he opened the door. It's pretty much all Greg has eaten over the past week and a half. Dennis realized why.

She was cute, at least as cute as you can be wearing green polyester pants, a red and white button down shirt, and matching baseball cap. She was about 5'3" and 110 lbs soaking wet. Her long red hair was in a ponytail which was pushed through the back of the cap and her round glasses seemed to take up much of her face. But that didn't matter to Greg.

"Hi Cheri" Greg said, his face flushed.

"Hi Greg" she responded.

Dennis sighed. He could tell by the puppy dog looks in their eyes that they were crazy about each other but they needed a little nudge.

"Hey, I want to test out this new camera. You know, to see if it works. Why don't you two stand next to each other?"

Greg got up and put his arm around Cheri as Dennis looked through the viewer.

She pulled her arms behind her back and leaned to one side. “Oh, you know, trying to plan out the rest of the week-end. Some of the girls were thinking of heading to the beech, but I’m not sure. Hopefully there’s a better party around here than the one we went to yesterday. The one last night was kind of a bore.”

Dennis nodded. She was generally more interested in partying than studying. Kristen cocked her head to one side. She had a small crush on Dennis. Greg knew this, but figured Dennis would eventually figure it out.

“So, Dennis, any plans for the rest of the week-end yourself?”

Dennis glanced out the window to get a general weather forecast. “It should be a nice day. I thought I’d get in a run before it got too hot.”

Kristen bit her lip. “Uh, yeah. I was thinking of heading to the gym too.”

This peaked Dennis’s interest. The thought of Kristen working out and getting buff was enough to focus his attention. “Really? Have you been working out regularly?”

Kristen had a feeling that Dennis liked the fit girls, so in order to make him happy, she nodded her head. “Sure. You know, nothing special, just some cardio and light weights.”

The fact she had only gone once didn’t seem to be an important adder.

Dennis, slightly crestfallen nodded. “Oh.” He wrinkled his forehead as he tried to remember something.

“Kristen. Do you still have my Chemistry notes?”

Kristen looked thoughtfully at Dennis. “Um, yeah, I think so. Do you need them back?”

Dennis nodded, mentally planning his own week-end. “Yeah, if you don’t mind.”

Kristen smiled brightly. Her smile was one of her best features. “Sure. Follow me.”

Dennis stood back up and headed out the door and into the next room behind Kristen. The door shut behind them and Dennis looked around the messy room as Kristen shuffled though the papers on her desk. His eyes focused on a set of pink bar bells. Had he looked closer, he would have noticed dust. But once again, his thoughts of a fit, tight, Kristen entered his brain. Dennis looked back at her and before he took the notes he glanced at the camera as if the camera were calling to him. “Uh, hey Kristen. Would you mind posing for me? I haven’t even had a chance to try out my new camera.”

Kristen, happy that he would ask, but a bit nervous about her looks and dress, bit her lip. “But I look awful.”

Dennis chuckled. “All girls say that. You look very pretty.”

Sighing, and overcoming her nervousness because she wanted to please Dennis, nodded weakly. “Well, OK. Maybe a long distance picture.”

Dennis laughed as he fiddled with the settings. “I’ll do my best.”

As he pulled the camera up, he tried to imagine what Kristen looked like under those baggy sweats. What if she didn’t just work out a little, but really worked out a lot? What if her body took to weights like a fish to water? He imagined her with a killer fitness body, toned and tight. Or what if she had grown muscles so fast that she was nervous and was trying to hide them? As he brought the camera in front of him and focused his mind wandered to his comic books. What if Kristen were a super hero in disguise able to transform like Wonder Woman or She-Hulk?” Pulling in a breath, he snapped the picture.

And the world around him changed. He had to blink to take it all in. The dorm room was now different. Kristen’s nervousness was replaced with confidence as she pulled her shoulders back and stood up tall.

“You know Dennis, it’s about time you get a chance to see the real me.”

And before he knew it, Kristen started to remove her sweats. And Dennis gasped as Kristen revealed….

Dennis glanced over at Kristen and hoped never to be on the receiving end of that stare.


Kelsey stepped over the threshold, wearing only a tank top and shorts. Her physique was clearly larger than her roommate’s, which on her more compact frame, was saying a lot.


“Oh, hi, Kristen,” she said. “Hope I’m not interrupting anything. I didn’t know you were having company over tonight.” Her eyes found Dennis and they moved up and down his body, taking in every detail. Then she smiled at him. It was very clear to them both that Kelsey had barged in on purpose.


“I thought you were supposed to be at the gym tonight,” Kristen replied crossly.


“I was,” she replied, finally looking back at her roommate. “Have to keep growing this body, you know?” She glanced over at the weights in the room. “Oh, are you still using only 1.000 pounds? I was well beyond that point weeks ago.” She obviously enjoyed being more powerful than Kristen and had no problem at all with rubbing it in.

“That’s no excuse,” Kelsey told her. “I can already bench press well over 2,000 pounds and can deadlift and squat much more than that. And the people at the gym keep sending in bigger and bigger weights. You should see some of the machines they have for me now.”

“Well, since he’s a fictional character that never really existed in the first place, I don’t think he counts,” Kristen told her roommate coldly.


“A girl can dream though, can’t she?”


And so could Dennis. He could make it a reality for her, too. He began to imagine her strength surpassing superhuman levels. Able to press tons of weight for warm ups. Able to deadlift and squat on machines only Superman himself would find challenging. Machines that could handle hundreds of thousands of pounds and have Kelsey lift them as if they weighed nothing at all!

Which meant he had to look for other options. Something that would allow him to reign his sister in before she did anything he would regret. Hell, at this very moment, he was feeling nothing but regret! Couldn't he have found someone else to enjoy his muscle fantasies with?

He inwardly winced, "Ah, yeah, mom. I made sure she knows I'm here. Unfortunately..."

Luckily his mom didn't hear that last part, and she gave a pleased hum, "That's nice of you, dear. How is college? I hope you're not wasting your time, but studying enough."

"Okay, I'll see you later then." Dennis responded, watching his mother walk away.

He was impressed by her resilience. The divorce was a difficult affair, yet his mom managed to keep her head held high. Dennis applauded her for her discipline and--

Sure, he couldn't stand up against his sister, and he doubted that he could undo the transformation that the camera had put her through, but his mother could fix that. After all, if he was able to turn his sister into a powerful bodybuilder, then why not his mother too?

He snuck a few glimpses into the room as Sarah picked up every disk in the room and placed in onto the bar. There was nearly another two hundred left, so when she finished, the weight with the bar was nearly right at 400 pounds. A very large weight indeed.

Sarah looked at the weight and this time moved forward with a bit more caution. Pulling her chest up near the weight, she gripped the bar close to her pumped up pecs and carefully pulled it off the rack, continuing to hold it close. She took a step back and let out a breath. With more control than Dennis had hoped for, Sarah brought the bar down toward her female bodybuilder thick thighs and held it for a moment. Pulling in a breath, she slowly pulled the bar up, grunting with effort as her large biceps swelled and protruded with incredible detail and vascularity. With a satisfied yell of excitement, Sarah smiled as she completed the curl. She let the bar down with controlled force and leaning down, dropped the bar to the ground with a clang. She then looked up toward the door.

“Impressed Dennis?”

Dennis froze in his hiding place against the wall, unsure of what to do. Sarah reached over to grab the camera and walked toward the door lightly with a smile on her face. When she reached the door and saw Dennis plastered against the wall she let out a quick. “Boo!”

Dennis nearly jumped and then struggled to turn and face Sarah, who stood there with a satisfied smile on her face.

“I’m pretty strong now huh? I must be stronger than anyone at school I imagine. And these biceps are bigger too. But I’m guessing that there are still men bigger and stronger than me. What do you think Dennis?”

Dennis cleared his throat, realizing that Sarah wasn’t going to do anything to him at this moment. He took a step back, but Sarah took a step forward, keeping her eyes locked to his. Dennis let out a nervous breath.

“Well, I’m not sure. Maybe. But you’re really strong.”

Sarah looked at the camera and back at Dennis. “So if I say, wished to be stronger. Or say, bigger and stronger; all I need to do is think about it and take a picture?”

Dennis tried to change the subject. “I thought you were waiting for your friends.”

Sarah blinked her eyes, but didn’t change the smug expression on her face. “I am. But why wait? Wouldn’t you like to see me with even BIGGER biceps, or maybe the strength of one of your comic book heroes? Wouldn’t that be fun?”

Dennis gulped, looking at the camera with pain. “Uh, no. We don’t know what the consequences are yet of using the camera. The guy I bought it from said it was cursed.”

Sarah’s face went into a mock shocked expression. She pulled the camera up at arm’s length, pointing it at herself.

“Well then I’d better not take a picture, huh?”

Dennis’s shoulders slumped. He knew that he wasn’t going to talk her out of anything. He still followed the script.

“No, Sarah; that would be a bad idea.”

Sarah laughed. “Yeah. Thought so.”

She looked at the camera, smiled, and snapped the button. The camera clicked and Sarah….

As Sarah’s finger clicked off a picture Dennis caught a glimpse of the image on the viewfinder screen and his heart sank. Because she was holding the camera at arms length she only caught her head and shoulders in the shot, but what he could see was a combination of drop dead sexy and titanically powerful. “Ahhhhh!! Now we’re talking!!” The growing little sister moaned with pleasure. “It feels sooooo gooooood to be soooooooooo STRRRROONNGGGG!!!!”

Her body was enormous, her arms were epic and each hung down at her side from medicine ball sized shoulders four feet wide. Even relaxed her pythons were bigger than anything Dennis had ever imagined.

As her growth explosion slowed to a stop Sarah took in a deep breath and closed her eyes, the let the air out slowly. She spent a silent moment basking in the power her new body possessed. Then she opened her eyes and quietly placed the camera on the table once more. Every move she made caused a symphony of pops and snaps from the seams of her clothes which were just barely hanging on. Sarah then moved quietly back to where Dennis stood, her meaty legs pumped and flexed with each step. Dennis should have been excited. He’d been waiting his entire life to glimpse a muscle goddess like the one that now stood before him. This was his dream made flesh. But his sister was never included in his dream, and that made this a nightmare. As Sarah approached him he noticed that her face had changed along with her body. She wasn’t just taller and stronger but sexier too. She’d created the perfect version of herself with a supermodel face that no man would be able to resist, massively over sized muscles that would intimidate anyone in the world, and the strength to overpower armies.

Sarah arrived at the door to the room where Dennis stood. She had grown up by a full foot and now towered over Dennis by 3 inches. She raised her arms and flexed her new biceps. Before they were 24 inches around, Sarah had wished for arms over twice as large when she’d taken her photo. As her forearms curled upward and her fist clenched the peak of her insane bicep rose higher and higher. She squeezed harder and harder pushing more and more size into her ridiculous arm until the peak topped out higher than her own head. Her arm was now a full 50 inches around and filled with the hardest, strongest muscle the world had ever seen.

“I believe I asked you to leave,” Sarah growled in a new voice that was sexier and commanded obedience.

Dennis quickly nodded and made a break for the front door and the safety of the outside world.

Sarah listened as Dennis sped away in his car while she flexed and examined her new body in the full body mirror against the wall.

“You were right, little brother,” She said to herself with a sexy grin on her face. “This was a bad idea. That camera really is cursed!” Then she laughed harder and louder than she had ever laughed before in her life.

Sarah once more tried curling the 400 pound weight but found no resistance. Instead she began twisting the iron bar into a pretzel shape with equal ease. Just then the doorbell rang so she dropped the weight to the floor with a loud clang and made her way to the living room. Opening the door she found....
121232.title: Grows huge muscles with super human strength

1212322.content:
Sarah walked out the door to look around. Nobody was there. Her eyes narrowed at the thought that someone would ring the doorbell and run. If she found out who they were, she’d pummel them into the dirt. It was then that she noticed Dennis’s car. Cursing to herself, Sarah quickly turned and marched toward the weight room where the camera was.

Dennis had known better than to directly challenge Sarah. The fact that she let him off the hook twice was a blessing, but gave him the opportunity he needed to get the camera back. After pealing out of the driveway he roared around the block and parked the car in front of the neighbor’s house. He got out, ran to the front door, rung the bell and then ran to the back. Sneaking in he saw Sarah walk toward the front door and snuck into the weight room, barely having time to gasp at the bent weight bar lying on the ground. Holy crap, Dennis thought, she must really be super strong now! Dennis’s pulse raced when he saw the camera. Grabbing it, he turned to head out the back before Sarah would notice, figuring that he’d come up with a quick plan once he got away. He didn’t want to risk trying to take a picture of Sarah if she were charging at him.

Sarah grunted when she saw Dennis head out the back door. Damn he was fast when he wanted to be! But Sarah smirked. He may be fast, but I’m a damn Supergirl! Turning around she ran to the front door, figuring that Dennis would head back to his car to get away.

Sure enough, Dennis had sped around the house and was only a few feet away from the car when Sarah burst through the front door, tearing it off the hinges and smashing it into several pieces. Dennis gasped in fear as he opened the car door and jumped in. He threw the car into drive and slammed on the accelerator, but Sarah was just starting to accelerate too! She smiled as her mighty legs churned and her massive arms pumped like twin pistons propelling her forward. Apparently super strength included super speed. Cool!

But Dennis didn’t think it was so cool as he watched the speedometer rise quickly to 30, then 40 then 50 miles per hour as he sped out toward an open road, hoping another car didn’t get in the way. By the time he reached 55 miles per hour Sarah looked like she was disappearing in the rear view mirror. Unfortunately, Dennis had to slow to make the turn onto the main road and that gave Sarah a chance to put herself into the next gear.

Sarah smiled as the wind whipped around her long raven hair and her bare feet started to rip into the weaker parts of the road. Dennis was speeding away, but not for long. Sarah was reveling in her strength and her power and this chase was exciting. She wanted to see how fast she could really go! The fact that Dennis was pulling away momentarily didn’t bother her, so when he slowed to make the turn, Sarah smirked as she quickly caught up.

Dennis wasn’t so thrilled and slammed on the accelerator once again once he made the turn. Sarah was only 10 feet away when he made the turn, but the distance widened once he started to accelerate. But to his horror, she didn’t disappear behind him even as he topped 70 mph. If anything, she was gaining! Dennis grit his teeth as his speed increased. Good thing he was on a straight part of the road. But he knew it wouldn’t last and worse yet, he would soon run into traffic.

Sarah was loving the chase. Her super powered body churned forward like a machine with her massive muscles pumping forward at an ever increasing pace. By the time she reached 70 mph her legs and arms were nearly a blur. And yet she felt she could go faster! So with a concerted effort she picked up the pace as her seemingly indestructible body blasted forward. Within moments, even as Dennis neared 90 mph, Sarah was at his bumper! With incredible speed and dexterity Sarah reached down under the bumper to the frame even while running at 100 miles per hour and picked up the back of the car! Dennis yelped as felt the back of the car rise and he instinctively pulled his foot off the accelerator. He could see the smiling face of his sister clearly in the rear view mirror and his heart sank.

Sarah felt the car no longer pull against her, not that she couldn’t have stopped the car anyway. But now she easily slowed her own pace, quickly guiding the car off the road into the weeds. Sarah released her grip quickly and the car bounced in the dirt. She darted to the passenger side and with one quick tug, ripped the door off the frame and tossed it 20 feet away with the flick of her wrist. She bent down to look at her terrified brother.

“And where did you think you were going little man?”

Dennis had already grabbed the camera and quickly pulled it up even as Sarah reached her massive arm into the car to pull Dennis out. Dennis scrambled to the passenger side and opened the door. Sarah grunted as she reached in, but she just missed him as he fell out of the car. Sarah pulled out of the car and reached down under the frame.

“Don’t think you’re getting away!”

Sarah stood up, pulling the car off the ground in front of her and with a quick toss a few feet into the air above her! Dennis gasped as he watched this impossible feat of strength. Sarah reached up and deftly caught the car and held it momentarily above her head. Grinning down at Dennis, Sarah was enraptured by what she was capable of doing. But she saw that Dennis had the camera and her expression hardened.

“If you know what’s good for you you’ll drop the camera, lest I lose my grip and your car winds up on top of you!”

Dennis gulped. Should he take the chance of taking a quick picture or should he give up? Another car had stopped and the girl who was driving had gotten out investigating when she had noticed Dennis’s car veer off the road. She now stared on with shock as she saw Sarah lift the car over her head. Dennis saw her too and noticed how hot she looked in her shorts and tank top. But his focus immediately shifted back to Sarah.

Dennis knew he would only have one chance to take a picture before Sarah really did drop the car on him. But there was one problem. Dennis was only thinking about how big and strong and powerful his sister was. On how she was well on her way to becoming a real Supergirl. He may have wanted to end all of this to protect himself, but everything had happened so fast that instead of making Sarah weaker, he thought about making her stronger instead! He once again focused on her giant biceps, gasping at the sight of her arm as she released the car with one hand and flexed her other bicep up. Muscle fibers popped out in every direction as her peak climbed higher, backed up with pulsing, petrified, nightmarish muscle. Finger sized veins snaked their way up the sides as her peak passed the top of her fist and up to the top of her head once again! Dennis’s mouth hung open at the site of what had to be a 50 inch bicep flex!

So instead of thinking about making her weaker, he thought about Superman and what Sarah could do against the strongest superhero of them all. And even her biceps, could they possibly get any bigger? Perhaps it just best to put the camera down and give up.

So as Sarah looked on menacingly and the car tipped toward him, Dennis.

Sarah and Marcy had started lifting weights as junior high girls, just wanting to stay in shape for the summer before high school. But they soon discovered that their bodies reacted almost immediately to the weights. Competing against each other, they were soon lifting weights to challenge any boy in class. Just then, the basement door opened and Sarah walked in. “I thought I’d find you two down here.” Immediately letting go of Dennis, they took a few steps away from each other as his sister descended the stairs.


It was then that Dennis noticed…

It changed it so that not only would it accept the nanites and any changes they did, but 'worked together' with the nanites, if you could call it that, to make even greater changes.

The nanites on the other hand, had a malfunction in their programming, which caused them to believe any small damages would be cause to change, enhance, and strengthen it further.


What this caused for Tina was...

Within a day, she was fully recovered from her injuries and even better than she had been before. Going to the gym that day, she quickly discovered her almost limitless stamina and near-instant recovery from anything. After a week, she had already started lifting cars to even get a 'pump'. Turning toward the mirror again, Megan sighed, flipping her dull brown hair over her shoulder. At 5 foot 2, the dress was long enough, but a bit tight in the shoulders. Standing on her bare toes, Megan was about to reach down and pull the dress off when the door burst open.

Dennis immediately saw it wasn't Sarah and pointed the camera down, clicking harmlessly at the ground. Megan turned and took a step back and then let out the breath she had pulled in. Dennis gave her a quizzical look.

'Megan? Megan Johnson?'

Megan sniffed as she reached over and turned off the music. 'Dennis. Aren't you supposed to be at college?'

Dennis stood back up, trying to act like the man in the room with a girl in front of him. 'I just came home to do laundry. What are you doing in here?'

Megan pulled up a wry smile. She could tell Dennis was nervous around her. It was a trait that allowed to easily zone in on the weak boys and terrorize them. Funny how this much older boy would feel that way around her. After allowing the long pause to make Dennis shift nervously, Megan laughed.

'Sarah told me I could check out her old clothes that no longer fit. She got a call and ran next door for a moment.'

Dennis continued to look at her, knowing what this kind of girl did to him. 'Oh.'

Dennis knew all about Megan. How she would bully younger kids, especially boys. And while this upset him on the outside, it thrilled him a bit on the inside. One of his many fantasies was the idea of an average girl being stronger than the boys and making their lives miserable. Sure it was an odder one, but a dominating female was just one off-shoot of his female muscle growth fantasies. Just like having a school girl outmuscling Superman or the Hulk. And here close up was a real girl bully. At least she used to be. Now it was Dennis's turn to turn a wry smile. She was still pretty short. And by the looks of things, wasn't really all that big. She must have been tough in the sixth grade when she was this big. But now, not so much.

This time the long pause made Megan a bit nervous. What was this guy staring at?

'So, what were you hoping to do when you burst in here anyway?'

Dennis blushed. 'Uh, take a picture of Sarah dancing around to the music.'

Megan snorted. 'Um, OK. Is that like a new camera or something?'

Dennis pealed his eyes off her and looked at the camera. 'Oh, yeah. I just picked it up today.'

Megan nodded her head. 'Well, have you tried it out yet?'

Dennis shook his head. Megan rolled her eyes. She wished she were strong enough to knock his head into a wall, but figured if she was going to get rid of him, she'd play along.

'Well, do you want to take a picture of me to try it out. Even though I'm in this ugly dress.'

Dennis bit his lower lip. 'Oh, it's not that bad.' He looked down at the camera again and shrugged his shoulders. 'But if you don't mind.'

With that Dennis pulled the camera up, looked at Megan and clicked the camera. An just like that Megan'.

Megan smiled as sweetly as she could. “Of course. I think my strength, age and size scare them. And I haven’t even figured out what to do with all of this. It only happened to me recently.”

Dennis allowed himself to get drawn in as Megan continued. “So I was wondering. Your camera may have been the cause of this. It’s the reason we’re here. Maybe you could help me. I may be strong, but I’m afraid that if the entire Justice League of the Avengers attack me that I’ll lose.”

And as she pulled up her arm, flexing her small, but firm bicep she pouted. “And with this body against those big, strong men, what chance would I have?”

Dennis stared at her arm, imagining it growing bigger. He then looked at the camera. Had he really caused all of this? If so, then he could undo everything. But then again, if they were in the comic books, why couldn’t he see where this led? Looking at the sad eyes being expertly faked by Megan, he nodded.

“Um, OK Megan. I’m not sure about what the camera can do, but let’s find out.”

Pulling the camera up, he lined up a shot, and thought about.

As he held the camera up and begun to think about drawing them back into the 'real' world, he couldn't help but think about Megan, aka Super Bully, being unleashed into the world, with no super heroes or villains to stop her with no limits to what she could do..

And as he thought about this the tangent about her being vulnerable to them led his mind to race with the idea of her being strong enough to defend.. no.. defeat the Justice League and Avengers combined..

Add to this him falling for her 'sad, loving, potential super girlfriend if you're nice to me' act he thought about turning the still tomboyish girl (with enhanced breasts) into a true 'girlfriend of his dreams'.

Unfortunately for Dennis, this then brought him full circle to his original thoughts.. and the nagging idea at the back of his mind about her being a Super Bully that was acting too nice..

So.. with all these thoughts in mind.. Dennis clicked the shutter button and a moment later both of them were aware they were back in the 'real' universe.

--
Note;
Now due to the device needing several seconds to alter the physics of reality to allow a superpowered being to exist, this unfortunately would lead (as you're about to see) to Dennis not only having his dreams crushed, but seeing the horrific after effects take hold.

--

Dennis smiled nervously as Megan began to giggle at their return, before flowing into hysterical laughter.

At first he was confused, his picture hadn't appeared to work and now this possible super girlfriend was laughing like a mad woman.

Before he could even think though she'd stopped laughing and pulled him close, enveloping him in her arms, her super breasts pushing hard against his chest.

''Aww Dennisss.. thank you sooo much.. you have no idea how much this means.. you giving me this power.. bringing me back.. makes me think.. maybe we could have a future together, you and me. Do you want to marry me Dennis?'' she smiled sweetly.

''Y.. yes of course I do!''

''Say it Dennis.. let me hear you say it!''

And with that Dennis heard a clicking noise and saw Megan pull out her phone from behind her back. Her sweet smile transformed into something wicked and suddenly he was resting against the far wall as her laughter rang out.

Everyone you know will hear this.. and to top it off.. now we're back in the real world there are no constraints on violence like in comics.. no heroes.. only m-OOOOOOOOH... WHAT.. HAVE .. YOU... DONE??!!''

And with that, the thoughts that Dennis had had, began to take effect. Megan's power increased beyond comprehension.. to the point that a single flick of her finger could atomise an area 500 miles across. That a simple tense of one of her smallest muscles could create a shockwave akin to a small tactical nuke going off. I can heal and bring back to life anyone I crush.. there's nothing anyone on this world can do to escape.. i'm going to make everyone's lives a living hell.. starting with yours.."

Once every piece has turned to dust, the cloud contracts and mergs with Megan. Her face explodes with glee as her whole body starts glowing and her logo changes again, this time to 'GB'.

13.content:
As Dennis walked out of the pawn shop he placed the camera in his pocket and checked the bag of clothes on the back of his scooter. Nodding his head that everything was secure, he climbed on and turned the key. Oh sure, he knew the scooter was hardly a manly machine, but for around campus and heading home it did the trick. He smiled as he knew his mom would welcome the visit.

Heading toward home he neared a busy area of town with a large park. Pulling over to park for a moment, he pulled the camera back out to try it out. He started pointing at objects to check the focus and looked at the menu to set the options. While he was standing there he noticed the events around him.

The high school girl’s cross country team was running a loop around the park and he still knew a few members from the team. As a previous runner he had dated another girl his age. Leanne, he remembered. Sighing, he thought about her thin frame and taught muscles. He had always fantasized about the girl’s cross country team taking up power lifting. And of course becoming the strongest girls in the country. He smiled to himself. He never did go half way with his fantasies. The power lifting cross country runners. How silly.

He looked over and up at the large building being erected across from the park. The building looked like it would be 50 stories high, but was still mainly at the steel girder stage. A group of construction workers were on break and were harassing a business woman as she walked by. He could barely believe that sort of thing still happened. The woman was doing her best to ignore them, but Dennis could tell she was annoyed. His thoughts drifted to the She-Hulk. What if the woman could grow big, super humanly strong muscles and ruin all of their hard work?

Dennis attention was then turned toward a high pitched yelp as he saw two older boys pushing two younger girls off the swings. The girl’s hit the dirt and scrambled to get up. The boys laughed and got on the swings. Dennis sniffed and frowned. Bullies. He always hated bullies, since he had been at the wrong end on more than one occasion. He wished he could give the girls some type of boost to get back at the boys. Some big muscles and serious strength. They could become the school’s bully busters. He often wished for that back in grade school.

A cheer over at the other end of the park pulled his attention away from the swings. It looked like an old fashion arm wrestling match was going on. In fact, several. A few woman looked on, apparently the girl friends of some of the participants. Dennis smiled coyly. Wouldn’t those tough guys run home with their dicks in their hands if a hot girl could beat all of them? A hot muscle girl of course.

Looking at his watch, he started pointing the camera again, thinking about the different images. And once he found the one he was interested in, and with the fantasies associated with them firmly in his consciousness, he snapped the picture.

Dennis took a picture of..
13.title: Back home to show his Mom the camera

131.content:
As the girl’s cross country team took a turn on the path, Dennis realized he would have a decent shot of them. He could test out his camera and send the picture to his old coach for the school’s scrap book.

It was a cool day, so the girls all had on some type of long sleeve top or a light weight jacket. Some had on tights, but others were still wearing shorts. Most of them had their long hair tied in a pony tail that bobbed back and forth as they ran. The eight member team was small, but they were decent, and were looking to compete for the conference title.

As he waited for them to near, he had ample time to solidify his thoughts. What if the girls had just started weight lifting last year and on a lark decided to compete? With little competition and some strong desire, they wound up taking state. The fact that they finished higher than the boy’s team upset the lifting coach, who was also the boy’s football coach. This drove the girl’s to try harder and over the summer they had made vast improvements. Dennis’s fantasies ran deep and he had not just thought about the girls being state level girl power lifters, but growing rapidly toward world record holding muscle bulging super athletes. And he had drifted toward the word super. Even as the picture in the lens shifted around his thoughts, Dennis hardly noticed the image in his camera change as the girls were still over 70 yards away. If he did, he would have noticed the girl’s bodies morph with this thoughts.

Penny was the team captain and one of only two seniors on the team. She was 5 foot 2 and held the same build as the rest of the team. Thin, but fit with small breasts. The girls ranged in ages from 14 to 18, with the freshman twins taking the award for the team’s smallest at 4 foot 9 and 89 pounds. Of course the tallest girl was only 5 foot 6 and 120. Certainly not a stocky group.

But their bodies, muscles and strength were all much different in the picture as Dennis lined up the shot and finished his thoughts. The changes were recent and dramatic. And things were about to come to a head as the boys were growing very upset with what these once scrawny girls were accomplishing. And the girl’s were getting tired of the boys and the coach giving them grief. Before Dennis could finish the next scene in his head he concentrated on lining up the picture, not realizing the imagine forming in his camera. If he did, he would have noticed the bulging leg muscles, broad shoulders and tight jackets in the picture. Once the girl’s were close to him, he snapped the picture and smiled as he pulled the camera down.

Dennis turned before he noticed that the girls' pace had quickened. As reality took a spin, the girls didn’t even lose a stride as their bodies went through dramatic changes. As far as they knew, it was a cool day in the park on a hard 7 mile run. The girls continued to chat as if nothing new had happened. The legs of every girl now bulged larger than a top level fitness competitor and their biggest problem now was chafing of their highly developed inner thighs.

The jackets now had imprints on the back with state power lifting champions. Others had long sleeve t-shirts with cross country conference champions on them. Just like Dennis’s fantasy, these eight girls were not just growing toward world class power lifters, but were quickly becoming some of the best runners in the state, perhaps the nation.

As the girl’s turned toward school for the last mile, they picked up the pace faster than they were able to accomplish just days before. They were the defending conference cross country champions and were now heavily favored to repeat. Somehow they were becoming even faster and stronger the last few weeks. Stories were written about the Iron City girls team, but nobody could put their finger on why they were so good. The girl’s only knew one thing. The more they practiced the faster they became. And the more they lifted the stronger they became. Why these 8 girls were becoming so much faster and stronger was unknown to everybody.

As they charged into the front of the school, they all slowed to a stop in the parking lot near the gym, catching their breath and giving each other high fives.

Penny smiled at the rest of the girls. “Good work out everyone. I doubt the school records will survive another meet.”

Suzanne, the other senior and tallest at 5 foot 6, chuckled. “You mean the ones we already own?”

Kelly, a 5 foot four inch blonde haired knock out joined in the laughter. “And don’t you mean state records?”

Becky, one of the twins, wrinkled her brow. “Are we getting close to the national records now?”

Penny shrugged her shoulders. “Maybe. But enough about that. Let’s head in and lift some weights. I don’t know about the rest of you, but I’m feeling even stronger today than I felt yesterday! And if the boys are lifting today, it’s time to have a little chat.”

The other girls giggled and nodded their heads. They flexed their sizable biceps for each other, marveling at the newly developed muscles and the hardness that came with the growth.

The girls all followed Penny into the gym and around to the weight lifting area. Several football players were working out. They looked up nervously and angrily as the girl’s walked in. While Dennis’s picture was a boon to the girls, the boys were about to relinquish the part of jock rulers of the school. And they were none too happy about it. It was more than just a little disconcerting that a 5 foot two inch cross country girl was pound for pound stronger than any boy in school.

And this year has started off even worse for the boys. Over the summer, the girls were outdoing themselves nearly daily. The football coaches demanded drug tests even though the girls passed every one. By the end of the summer the girls were getting pissed. The boys weren’t subject to the same scrutiny, even though they suspected the boys were shooting up. This only drove the girls to work out harder.

Before the start of the school year doctors were brought in to examine them. How could all eight girls possibly be this strong, the football coach begged. And less than one month into new school year they were becoming stronger seemingly every day. That’s impossible, bellowed the coach! And to top it all off, their muscles, already larger than any other girl’s in school began growing bigger at an alarming rate as far as the coach was concerned. So the tests continued. And to make matters worse (for the coach anyway), just two days ago, the needles used to pull their blood out started breaking against seemingly hardening skin, which started making the girls realize that they were growing beyond the ordinary. And due to all of this, the girls had weeks ago stopped showing off in front of everyone, doing their lifting in private in order to hide their gains. If there was an audience, they maxed out on their old best lifts. This only backed the football coach off a little.

With the knowledge that they were now truly able to outdo the boys best lifts in every category, they weren’t going to take the abuse lightly. The harassment may have been coming from the coach, but it was the players who pushed for answers.

The girls all gave the football players a cold stare as Penny stopped at the edge of the hardcore lifting area that the football players had filled.

Time for a showdown.

Penny took off her jacket and the rest of the girls followed suit, leaving them all in their athletic bras or tank tops. And just like Penny had hoped, the boys all watched with horror. Every girl was bursting with hard, bulging, detailed muscles. Every chest pressed outward with rippling pectorals, every shoulder was broad, every back wide, every stomach sported no less than a 10 pack with pebble sized obliques running up their sides. Each leg was thick, every ass was hard and firm and every arm on their slight runners frame was stocked with more muscle than all but the biggest football players. And even those boys were in jeopardy. Penny turned to face the boys and with a mock yawn, pulled her arms up and finished with a double bicep pose that rocked their world. For the biceps that less than one month ago were hard 12 inch mounds of power were now 20 inches of rock hard might! And right on queue, each girl stared at the boys and flexed their own biceps. Every girl, including the “diminutive” twins was sporting biceps over 18 inches around! And if that weren’t enough, those same muscles pulsed with incredible energy and rapidly increasing strength.

“Suck it boys. You’re simply second rate compared to us. And you had better get used to it, because we’re on a roll! Our biceps have been growing a quarter inch bigger. Each. And. Every. Day.”

Juliet, the other twin, spoke up. “I grew half an inch after an intense session yesterday.”

Becky nodded her head. “Yeah, me too.”

Penny laughed. “You hear that boys, the 4 foot nine inch freshman girls added half an inch to the biceps just yesterday and are sporting…”

Both girls beamed with pride. “18 and half!”

Penny turned back toward the boys. “18 and half inch biceps. Face it, there isn’t a boy in school as strong as the smallest, weakest girl on our team! So if you know what’s good for you, you’ll get your coach to back off.”

Penny released her flex and the rest of the girls followed her lead. The boys all fumed, their faces turning red.

And as the girls released their awesome flexes, Penny smirked.

“So seeing as we’re the strongest in the school, get the hell off our machines!”

The rest of the girls stared at Penny with surprise. But as the boys all stood up, unwilling to believe Penny’s bold statement, the girls all smiled. The time for a showdown had finally arrived.

1312.content:
"Tell you what boys, we'll give you a chance to hold your title as Kings of the Weight Room. You pick a champion, and we'll pick a champion - and they'll compete in the bench press. Whichever side's champion lifts the best press wins - how does that sound?"

The quarterback smirked. "Alright - but no challenging the results until all current members of both teams have graduated.", he spat back.

"Sounds fine to me - if we win, the football players have to give up the weight room to the girls cross country team for the next 4 years till Juliet and Becky graduate. You win, you get to keep the weight room at least until then."

The QB nodded and raised his hand and signaled his team. It was a well known signal they'd used many times when having to deal with other school's football teams. It meant bring out Chad.

Chad "The Bear" Barekowski stood up from the bench press apparatus - 6'8" tall and built like his namesake (some said almost as hairy too). The QB felt absolutely confident. As much as these girls had been seen lifting they couldn't touch Chad in the bench press - Chad was in training for a world record attempt, had it scheduled for the day he graduated. Heck, he'd just been repping 800 lbs. on the bar as a warm up.

The sly grin on Penny's face quirked slightly as she put her hand backward and used it to encourage her already chosen champion forward - Juliet.

The football players broke out laughing - Juliet looked less than confident - but Penny was pleased with what was going to happen. The QB quieted his team and after a quick huddle convinced them this was for the best - just humiliate these girls and get it over with.

"Alright, Bear lifts first."

Chad moved into place and the QB loaded the bar for him - 1000 lbs, not the world record but damn close all things considered. Chad was on a real surge recently so there wasn't much doubt he'd pull it off, but two of the football players stood as spotters.

Chad got under the weight - took his time to ready himself and then, in an impressive display causing muscles all over his body to bulge as he tensed for the lift, took the bar off it's rack, lowered it to his chest and raised it back up - arms getting a little bit of a shake from the effort near the top before racking it.

The Bear sat up with a roar, beating his chest - the idiot didn't seem to understand the difference between bear and gorilla Penny silently laughed to herself.

"Alright ladies - playtime's over, time for you to get your sweet little asses out the door."

"What? But the contest has only just started."

"Listen, Penny, a joke's a joke, but if you put that pipsqueak under that bar you'll kill her - heck, she won't even be able to reach the bar."

"Don't worry about it, Brad, I'll spot her if it'll make you feel better."

Two of the girls on the team moved to lower the bar to a level where Juliet could reach it - the football players were on the edge of yelling out for them to remove the weight first less it come crashing down hurting them. Then they witnessed the two girls sliding the bar down the stands with the full thousand pound weight on it in complete control.

OK, they decided - sure, two of them could do that - after all, it had been seen that they were unusually strong for girls - but when Juliet moved under the bar and Penny alone moved to spot her there were chuckles from some - while the more chivalrous got ready to move and save this freshman's life when the inevitable happened.

Then, the inevitable did happen - Juliet put her arms on the bar and began to push. Her entire body tightened as she called upon the full limits of her strength to lift this bar. She was about ready to give up after a few seconds of powering into it, but then she saw Penny smiling confidently down at her - if Penny thought she could do it, then damn it, she'd do it.

Before the startled eyes of the football team the bar left the rack and then was lowered down to Juliet's pert breasts and raised back up. Juliet was so elated she'd forgot this was a contest and began working out - pushing the bar up and down for reps, each one faster than the one before. The room was hushed when Penny finally broke the stunned silence by saying. "That'll do for a first lift Juliet."

Juliet reracked the bar and looked at it - so much weight - and she had just lifted it - lifted it as easy as she'd used to lift her book bag, maybe easier. And then she saw it - as impossible as it at first seemed - there were impressions of hands in the bar, too small to be Bear's. She put her hands back on the bar and found they were a perfect fit - she had accidentally compressed the bar in her grip.

Juliet felt a surge of confidence, these football players wanted to humiliate her, she'd humiliate them. She sat up on the bench and turned to face the bar, placing one hand in the middle of the bar she stood up. Penny could read in her face what she had planned and began to object. "Now Juliet, let's not overdo..."

But before her eyes Juliet lifted the bar from the rack with just one hand and began doing one arm curls with it. Penny's jaw almost dropped - sure they had all become strong, but what she was seeing bordered on insane. This petite girl was beaming with pride as she curled a near world record bench press in one hand.

"Juliet, that's amazing.", Becky said.

"I know,", Juliet replied, "and I can feel it getting easier - it's like I'm getting stronger by the second. Check out this arm.", Juliet flexed an arm that minutes ago had an 18.5" bicep - but the muscle that burst off her arm was clearly much larger than that now.

"So, Bear, whaddaya say?", Juliet said approaching her opponent - the juxtaposition of 4'9" girl to 6'8" man made the weight in her hand seem even more humerous. "Wanna try to match me? Think we should keep going? Here', take it."

And with that she held her hand out, palm up, not even gripping the bar, offering it to him and holding it as easily as she might offer a tray of pasta at her part time waitressing job.

Bear could feel the stares of the room, and assumed they were on him, waiting for him to show up this little girl - not realizing they were on her, waiting to see the next feat of incredible strength. He decided this was a prank on him and grabbed the weight in one hand and yanked it off her hand.

Because of the way she was supporting it, gravity and the laws of force actually made it quite easy to remove from her hand - holding it up was another matter. Bear was saved from completely losing the arm by Juliet's quick thinking and regrabbing the weight from him as well as supporting his arm with her own.

"You stupid jock, you could've killed yourself. Maybe you'd better get out of here and leave the heavy weights like this to the women."

Through the pain in his arm, Bear could see that in her haste to grab the bar Juliet had bent it a solid 20 degrees - her still increasing strength becoming more and more evident it was now clear that her muscles were under no strain from the weight she held.

13121.content:
The boys were all in shock. Hell, the girls were all in shock. Penny figured that Juliet was capable of out benching Bear, but she never would have thought that Juliet would become so overwhelmingly powerful like that. And so quickly.

Brian, the QB, ran over to Bear and helped him away from the super powered Freshmen girl.

“Freaks! I don’t know how this is happening, but when we find out, you’re all going down!”

Penny was about to say something, but Juliet spoke first.

“You try ANYTHING, or say ANYTHING, and I’ll twist your pathetic body as easy as….”

Juliet pulled her other arm up and gripping the bar still loaded with 1000 pounds at shoulder width continued to bend the already bent bar. The metal groaned, but to Juliet, it may as well have been a piece of string. Within moments, Juliet had twisted the bar into a bow and pulled it back out to her side with one arm..

“This metal bar. I could crush everyone of you football players by myself. Do you understand me?

By.

My.

Self!

Juliet then tossed the 1000 pound metal bow nonchalantly toward her sister, who was probably the only other person in the gym who could handle such a weight so easily. Becky caught the weight deftly. With one hand! She smiled wide as she too began to bend the metal like taffy with more terrible squeals.

Keeping her eyes on Brian and Chad, she continued her lashing.

“So before I catch wind that anyone let out a word of what you think we’re capable of, let me give you another demonstration.”

Juliet moved toward the squat machine. Thousands of pounds lay at the bottom. The machine itself weighed at least that and the frame was bolted into the concrete floor. She reached into the center of the machine and grabbed the main support beam. And then to the horror of everyone else in the gym save her twin sister, Juliet began to slowly pull the entire structure up, essentially attempting to curl 5000 pounds! With one arm! Only the inch thick, five inch long bolts stood in her way and as she started to bend the six inch thick re-enforced steel center frame. As she pulled, her body started piling on mounds of magnificent girl muscle all across her tiny frame. Muscle as large as Chad, the Bear began throbbing, pulsing and surging across her once diminutive body. Thighs and calves to match the biggest male bodybuilder pressed out on her short legs. The tree trunk thighs curved wickedly into her still narrow, yet insanely muscular abs. Her stretchable runner’s bra was now being strained to the limit against an onslaught of spectacular pectorals and rock hard breasts. Her back widened to ridiculous proportions and her arms bulged and expanded as her one arm began bending and ripping the large bolts as if they were made of soft clay.

And with one final power move that made everyone else weak in the knees, Juliet snapped the last bolt and curled the entire structure, over 5000 pounds of steel, with one arm. And after the first rep, she dropped the machine to the ground with a crash that shook the gym, smiled wickedly at the flabbergasted Brian and Chad, and quickly began to do another! And it was soon evident that even this impossible weight was becoming inconsequential to the super powered, mega muscled little freshman runner!

Still holding the enormous weight like it was barely there, Juliet took a step toward the confused and frustrated Chad and Brian and sneered.

“If you dare say anything, I will crush you. And there won’t be anyone who will be able to stop me! Your parents. The police. Hell, the fricking army! Nobody.”

Driving her point, Juliet tossed the ruined squat machine to the side and it smashed against the wall like an earthquake, shaking the gym.

“Not against my strength. Not against my muscles! Just think. I curled over 5000 pounds with my arm only this big.”

She then brought her free arm back up. The mighty 18 and half inch bicep she started the day with had grown to 20 inches after curling 1000 pounds and was now 22 massive inches around after curling the squat machine.

“Just think what I could do with a muscle THIS big! Maybe your Dad’s Hummer!”

Juliet flexed her bicep hard, and with her strength still on the rise, the muscle tissue multiplied faster than was previously humanly possible. If her arm was impressive before, now it looked like a mountain! Her bicep grew to 24 inches around with her first tense! And now the bicep rose like a balloon on a helium tank.

Staring right through the 6 foot 9 inch wall of man muscle, Juliet smiled cruelly.

“Or THIS big! How about the school bus!”

The scene was something out of some warped comic book. Juliet, the smallest girl on the team at 4 foot 9, was flexing up a bicep bigger than any boy or man in town. She had to strain her neck to keep her eyes on the 6 foot 8 inch Bear. The scene was over the top. And worse yet, her bicep was STILL expanding, and she was STILL growing stronger! After a few more fist squeezes, her bicep surged up to 28 incredible inches of steel hard girl muscle!

“Or even THIS big! I’m guessing I could handle a TANK with one arm now!”

As she flexed down again her bicep continued to grow, pushing against her massive forearm, expanding out to her thick shoulder and rising up into the air until her bicep circumference had reached 32 inches of steel hard, super strong girl muscle. Her arm was a foot tall from her deep tricep belly to her incredible bicep peak! There wasn’t a man alive with biceps to match that of this 14 year old mega girl!

And Chad, once the biggest, strongest man in the school, hell likely the entire world, started to pee his pants, the stain becoming evident as the smell soon reached the others. He was shaking nearly uncontrollably, totally and completely humiliated by this freshman girl! And even as she now knew that no boy would dare cross her; no man on earth could hope to challenge her; hell, no tank could stand up to her; she continued to flex down. And she continued to grow stronger. Tears began to flow down Chad’s face, begging her to stop. Brian had turned white and was already on one knee, ready to pass out. But still Juliet continued to flex her bicep, adding more muscle, more strength and more power to her dominatingly powerful young body!

“Or how about even THIS big! Bet I could curl a 747 now! With just this one arm!”

And as her bicep growth slowed and the rest of the boys and girls were nearly choking on their tongues, Juliet gave one more thunderous squeeze and sent her bicep peak to 36 inches around, 8 full inches bigger than the world record! A record crushing flex being displayed by a 4 foot 9 inch 14 year old girl!

Finally, Juliet stopped pumping her arm and reached her index finger out to touch the peak of her otherworldly bicep. She smirked and looked at the growing stain on Chad’s pants and then back up into his terrified, tear soaked eyes.

“There is nothing and nobody on this planet who could challenge me now. These muscles could stop a battalion of tanks and fend off a an air craft carrier’s worth of missiles! Your pathetic little man muscles are like soap bubbles to me now!

She paused for a moment as Chad choked back a sob, relishing the moment.

“So you boys aren’t going to do or say anything! Or I’ll rip out your hearts and shove them down your throats.”

Pausing to let her threat sink in and knowing full well they believed she could, Juliet scanned the room to make sure all eyes were still on her.

“Are we clear?”

Chad nodded his head like a 4 year old boy being scolded by his father. Brian passed out cold, having wet his pants too. The other boys were in various states of shock and fear. Every boy still standing nodded violently. Juliet released her monumental flex and sniffed.

“Now get the hell out of our gym! And if I catch any of you losers stepping foot in here without our permission, you’ll wish you were never born.”

As two other boys helped drag the passed out Brian and the sobbing Chad out of the gym, Penny looked wide eyed at the super powered freshman.

“My god, Juliet. That was a bit overboard don’t you think?”

Juliet sniffed coldly, puffing out her twin bowling ball pectorals, completing the destruction of her top and exposing her mind altering upper torso filled to the brim with raw, indestructible muscles.

“Why should I care what YOU think?”

Penny stiffened, both from her display of intimidating muscle and her tone. The cruel lecture to the boys was one thing, but she was her team captain. “Now Juliet, we all saw how strong you were, but we’re all pretty strong too.”

Juliet laughed. “Oh really? Do you really think your anywhere in MY class Penny? Really? I’m WAY stronger now then when I curled the squat machine. Weren’t you listening? I’m about a hundred times stronger now!”

Penny lost her staring contest and had to look at the ground. She may be strong, but Juliet was super human.

Juliet let out a soft, high pitch growl.

“So I think that this girl should be in charge. In fact, I believe Becky and I should be the captains of both the cross country and the weight lifting team. Seeing as we’re the real studs around here now!”

Penny was taken aback. Not having lifted a weight, she really had no idea if she could ever be anywhere in Juliet’s class, but at this point she thought it best to let it go.

“Well, OK, Juliet. You are obviously super strong. But the rest of us haven’t tried to pump up our muscles. However, since you and Becky are in charge, what do you want to do?”

And at that point, the initial picture taken by Dennis had neared a conclusion. But instead of ending, or erasing, another scenario was put into motion. Another set of wishes pulled from Dennis’s subconscious while taking the picture. And reality took another spin. And when it stopped, Juliet had her answer.

“You girls can stay here with Becky in charge. I’m are heading over to..”

132.content:
Amanda wasn't having a good day.

She was stuck in a dead end, mid-level job. Her boss was a jerk, the pay was minimal, and she was running late as her lunch order was messed up. She rushed down the street, past the new high-rise that was being built, when she started receiving catcalls from some of the workers on break. Amanda tried to ignore their comments and get back to work when one of them stopped her and continued on with his crude comments that his buddies through were hilarious.

"Listen" she said, "I'm just trying to get back to work".

"Oh I got something you can work" he replied, gesturing down towards his pants.

It was at this moment Dennis took the picture.

Amanda doubled over in pain, so excruciating that she was taken down to her knees. The man put a hand on her shoulder. Upon closer inspection, he was taken aback by her complexion, pale with a slight green tinge to it. It must be a bad case of food poisoning, he thought.


"Hey lady, are you okay?"

Her head snapped quickly over in his direction and a loud growl came from her lips.

"Get away from me!" she exclaimed as she pushed him away, causing him to fly into the nearby chain-link fence that separated the sidewalk from the work site.

Her brown eyes became a brilliant green. Her brown hair began to lengthen and take on a darker hue. Her navy skirt became tighter as her legs and glutes started filling up with muscle. The rapidly expanding legs started causing runs in her pantyhose as her diamond-shaped calves grew larger with rock hard muscle. Her feet started to burst through her new shoes. The rings on her right hand began to break off as her fingers lengthened and her hands grew larger. Amanda balled up her fists and bent her arms, causing the growing muscles to tear through her sleeves with ease and bulge under her blazer, the stitches in her garment popping one by one as her biceps became charged with superhuman strength.

Her breasts started enlarging at a rapid pace, the buttons on her silk blouse popped one by one until her chest exploded through her clothing and her abdominals looked like cobblestones on her stomach. Amanda tensed her back muscles and they tore through her blouse and jacket like someone would rip a piece of paper in half. Her biceps, now close to 20 inches erupted through her blazer like a powerful volcano.

She stood erect; her former 5’4” inch frame was replaced by an Amazonian 6’10” of beauty and brawn, her skin a deep emerald. She discarded her clothing, now in tatters, which was replaced by a purple and white two piece leotard. Dennis, shocked by this turn of events, was simultaneously afraid and aroused at what just happened.

Amanda let out a loud yell, which served as both a cathartic release from the painful transformation and the frustration she had been experiencing in her life. She turned towards the rest of the shocked workers (the one she had tossed into the fence was unconscious from the impact. She looked over and examined her new muscular figure. She clenched her fists, watched as her biceps bulged mightily, and gave a little smirk.

“You, you think its funny pestering women? You think its funny keeping me

She stepped over to the metal chain-link fence and ripped it down the center with ease and walked inside the work area. Letting out years of frustration, Amanda pounded the reinforced steel foundation of the building, creating large dents with her fists. Tensing her large, powerful legs, she leapt into the air with such force it created a small crater in the ground below. Amanda looked like a green missile to Dennis as she streaked towards the 30th story of the building. Even with such mass and speed, she landed with cat-like agility on the narrow beam, her size causing the metal to groan and bend underneath her feet. With her long arms she grasped a beam from the 31st floor and ripped it down. Amanda held aloft the large object above her head and began bending it slowly as the workers looked on in horror. She continued to twist it like a pretzel, the steel making painful noises as it was being contorted by her super-powered physique. After compressing it into a ball she threw it down towards the ground at an amazing rate of speed. The men scrambled as the spheroid landed with a loud boom! The men gathered around the hole Amanda created and looked at the metal ball resting over fifteen feet below. Then, a geyser of water began to shoot out as Amanda’s action caused the water line to burst, dousing the exasperated workers. She began to laugh.

“Now that’s funny!” she yelled towards them.

Police sirens began to fill the air, because of these displays, so Amanda decided to take off and she took off with another supercharged leap. Dennis also felt that he shouldn’t stick around either for questioning so he high tailed it out of there on his scooter.

On the way back home, he tried to make sense out of what happened. The shop owner said that the camera took “perfect” pictures and at the time that he used his camera on that woman, she hulked out just like in his thoughts. Is it actually possible, can he transfer his thoughts and dreams from his mind to reality through this camera?

1322.content:
Somehow missing out on the destruction he had wrought, Dennis headed home, turning up the corner and into his driveway. He hadn’t really caused all of that activity in the park had he? That simply made no sense. Trying to dismiss what had happened, he hopped off the scooter. Pulling off the load of clothes, Dennis walked through the garage into the laundry room and dumped the clothes. He turned into the kitchen and saw his Mom standing near the sink, drinking coffee and staring out the window.

“Hi, Mom.”

His Mom, Mary, shook her head and forced a smile. “Oh, hi Dennis. I guess I didn’t hear you come in.”

Dennis twisted his head slightly. “Is something wrong, Mom?”

Mary’s smile dropped and she held back tears. “No, no. It’s just that your father called and said he would be stopping by to drop off the last of the papers for me to sign.”

Dennis’s heart sank. He had never thought his parents would split up. It was only just a year ago that his Dad told his Mom that he was seeing someone else and wanted out of the marriage. It wasn’t just the fact that he was leaving, but that he was leaving her for a 22 year old fitness instructor he met at the gym. This drove Dennis nuts. First of all, how could he do that to his mom? And second, his girlfriend was seriously hot. He should be chasing after Laura, not him. At 5 foot 8, she was a picture perfect fitness model with blonde hair, athletic curves, young beautiful features and a pair of breasts that were likely purchased, but were still stunning. All of this was nearly more than Mary could take. She used to be in pretty good shape back in the day, but years of family life had taken a toll. Now she felt terribly alone, angry and betrayed. Dennis walked closer, putting his hand on her shoulder.

“Oh Mom, I am so sorry.”

Mary placed her hand on Dennis’s and then gently pulled in off. “You don’t need to be sorry. It’s your father that no longer wants to be around.”

Dennis stood there as his mom took a few steps to get some more coffee. She leaned up against the counter.

“He never really gave me a good reason other than he no longer had the same feelings toward me. I guess looking at the girl he left me for tells me he no longer found me attractive. It’s not like I can compete with what he’s chasing after. Maybe if I were 10 or 20 years younger.”

Dennis grit his teeth. What if his Mom COULD compete with Laura, or better yet put her to shame? What if she had the body of a 32 year old? Or a 22 year old. Then she could tell him where to go. Or make him come back. His Dad must like the muscle girls, just like him. Well, what if his Mom’s body was a muscle pumping powerhouse? That would show him.

Dennis flushed as he took a breath. He had gone to counseling about his parent’s divorce and figured he just went through 3 stages of grief in 30 seconds. Shaking his head and fighting back his own tears, he reached into his pocket and pulled out the camera, hoping to change the subject.

“Look, Mom, I got a great deal on a new digital camera. The guy at the pawn shop was practically giving it away.”

Letting out a deep sigh, his Mom’s expression softened. Dennis was a good son.

“That’s nice, dear. Have you tried it out yet?”

Dennis nodded his head. “Yeah, I took a picture when I stopped in the park.”

He raised the camera up toward his Mom. “How about a picture?”

His Mom reached up, touching the shoulder length black hair and scratching the back of her neck. The loose gray sweatshirt was an older one and the jeans didn’t hide her expanding behind. “Oh, I look awful, Dennis.”

Dennis smirked. “You women always say that. You look fine. And the best thing about digital pictures is that we can always erase it later.”

Mary shook her head. “Well, OK.”

She stood up as high as her 5 foot 2 inch frame in her bare feet would allow and smiled. She really was a good looking woman of 42 and the wrinkles around her soft green eyes were hardly noticeable.

Neither of them heard Dennis’s Dad pull in the driveway with Laura along for the ride. He hopped out of the car and headed toward the front door.

Meanwhile, Dennis held up the camera with several thoughts swimming in his head. What if his Mom was 32 and twice the woman that Laura was. What if his Mom were 22 and 10 times the woman, with bulging muscles and mega strength? Wrinkling his forehead at the image facing him from the camera, he jerked slightly and took the picture.

When he pulled it down he was surprised to see that his Mom looked.

Turning back around to yell at her to move, Sarah instead gave him a smug smile. Marcos only had but a moment to be confused before Sarah's thin arm exploded with muscle.

But it wasn't just her arm that suddenly grew, Sarah's whole body soon expanded with rapidly growing, and hardening muscles. New strength flowed through her veins, giving life to her muscles. Her tight black clothes were very quickly just a memory as her muscles tore through those like rice paper. The rate that her muscles grew in size and power was an incredible feeling.

However part of Dennis' fantasy was that his muscular women never lost their 'feminine' characteristics, namely the curvature of their bodies, and their boobs. Both of these things were enhanced on Sarah's body now as well. Her 'twins' stuck out like two soccer balls, unhindered by gravity and backed by massive rock-hard pecs. Sarah's biceps, even unflexed were like super-massive footballs, let alone when she flexes those monsters. Her legs were tree-like pillars of power and looked strong enough to crush coal into diamonds. Sarah's abs had seemingly 'caved-in' on themselves, turning into a washboard stomach the likes of which had never been seen before. All of this muscle and power still only rested below Sarah's beautiful face.

Marcos had never actually let go of Sarah's arm. He had stood, transfixed the whole time. But seeing all this muscle was apparently too much for the gang leader, and he fainted. Smiling at this, Sarah left him even as she felt her muscle still hardening, growing stronger. She was far stronger than any other human, heck probably more than a million humans, and getting much stronger. She soon reached Marcos' car, where the other three gang members had watched Sarah's transformation. Scrambling over each other, they rushed to get out of the car. Sarah gave them a few moments to get out before bending down and yanking the car off the ground with less effort than most people used to hold a feather.

Quite confident in her power, she crumbled the car like crushing a piece of paper. The sporty convertible was soon several feet shorter as it feebly tried to resist Sarah's incredible and growing power. But Sarah didn't stop there, and continued to crush the car into a smaller and smaller area. First into a rough cube shape like it had been put through a compactor, and then into a sphere about the size of a softball. Then she put her full strength (which increased even as she did so) into it, and put as much pressure on the metal ball as possible. Smoke or steam rose at the incredible heat and pressure she was exerting until Sarah felt nothing more in between her hands. Her strength was so great that with just that, she had quite literally crushed Marcos' car out of existence, or at least turned the metal into a gas or something. She really didn't care.

The police officer had seen this whole scene play out in front of him. While he had no clue how this girl had suddenly grown so muscular, before he had been quite prepared to help her should the gang member try anything, if nothing else he could have gotten them for speeding, she had grown so suddenly and taken control of the situation. However, he was still bound by his duty as an officer, and so he went up to the massive Sarah, and though she was several inches shorter, the pure power she radiated now made him feel quite tiny.

"M-ma'am, do you require as-assistance?" asked the officer.
"As you can see, no." said Sarah, turning to the nervous officer.
"O-of course. Would you like to pr-press charges?" he continued.
"On the three who were in the car, no. They're just losers who try and act tough in numbers. As for him..." Sarah indicated the unconsciousness Marcos, "I really don't care. You really couldn't ticket him, since he doesn't have a car anymore. He certainly won't bother me anymore. Now I'm going home."

The officer decided to pick up Marcos and take him to the station for questioning. Marcos would certainly be scared when he woke up.

Not caring that she was naked for all the world to see (she had just about been that before anyways), Sarah went home. She'd have to listen to her mother about being naked and how she had gotten all these muscles and so on. But one good point she had was that she wasn't going to hang out with Marcos or his 'friends' anymore. Finding clothes would be kind of hard, but she'd live with it.

So now we skip a bit in Sarah's life...

14.content:
Dennis walked out of the store with a spring in his step. Not only was the first day of school still four days away, but he was about to meet the girl he had a crush on during high school.

Gina may have had a small frame, but that only made the athletic muscles she sported seem all that much more dynamic. His senior year he remembered following her around the hallways staring at her bulging calves during basketball season when she wore her cheerleader outfit. And she was only a sophomore at the time.

He ran into her a few times since he graduated, but she was in jeans and loose fitting tops, so he wasn’t sure if she had held her build. In any event, he was happy the school counselor had looked up alumni going to their college. She had been the one to call him. How sweet was that?

Turning into the coffee shop, Dennis’s heart was beating like a drum. Gina spotted Dennis first, waving him over. Smiling, but containing his excitement, Dennis walked over to the table and sat down across from her. Gina seemed to be as excited as Dennis.

“Oh my god, Dennis! I can’t believe I’m in college! This place looks so awesome!”

Dennis laughed. “Well there are certainly plenty of things to do. I’ve been nearly everywhere at one point or another. I’ll be happy to show you around.”

Gina smiled and blinked her big blue eyes, causing Dennis’s to suck in a breath. If she was pretty before, she looked stunning now. Long, thick blonde hair spilled down over her shoulders. Her face was remarkably clean with only a few zits covered with make up, her nose was cute and even though she was wearing a retainer, her smile was radiant. The fact that she was wearing a loose top couldn’t conceal her pert breasts and strong but feminine arms. Gina leaned back into the chair and bit her lower lip.

“Well, since you asked there are some places I would like to see first if that’s OK.”

Dennis nodded his head. “Sure, whatever you want, we’ve got all day.”

Gina sighed nervously, still a bit overwhelmed by the new experiences. “Great! I brought my schedule so you can show me where my classes are at some point.”

Dennis glanced at her schedule as he ordered a coffee. “Sure, fortunately for you it doesn’t look too spread out. We should be able to swing by plenty of places.”

The two discussed a few things, including Gina’s high school career in both soccer and cheerleading. She had aspirations in both here, but currently had no scholarship. She wanted to see how her classes went first before trying to walk on. Dennis tried to encourage her, figuring she had a chance to make both if she really wanted. He also loved the idea of Gina working out and honing her athletic body.

After a brief pause, Gina leaned forward, spotting the camera pack hanging from Dennis’s side. “What’s that on your jeans?”

Dennis blushed, wondering what she was talking about, then turned to the side and laughed. “Oh, I just bought a new camera from a pawn shop.”

Dennis pulled it out to examine while Gina listened intently and shared his laughter concerning the warning. She took a drink of coffee and looked back at Dennis.

“Well Dennis, since you are my guide, what do you want to do next?”
