141.content:
They talked for nearly two hours, finding more and more in common. Dennis couldn't believe his luck. He was sure Gina was coming on to him. He was so excited he could hardly keep still.

Gina felt it too, but she was worried it was happening too quickly. She needed to think before things went too far.

"Would you mind showing me around a bit more? I've only seen the admin office, the gym and my dorm so far. This university is so much bigger than high school!"

"Sure. I mean, we shouldn't waste such a beautiful day in a coffee shop." They head outside and began to walk around the campus. Dennis rested his arm blissfully around Gina's shoulders, while Gina clung tightly to him with her arm around his waist and leaned her head against his shoulder. This is what he had always dreamed of when he was still in high school. Back then he had never dared to try anything with Gina, but now, with a couple of years of experience behind him at university, and the allure that his familiarity with the campus scene gave him in her eyes as a new freshman, he finally had the confidence to do what he always should have done.

It was a warm, late summer day. Clusters of students were standing around on the grass, a few Frisbee tossing games going on lazily around them. Music with extra-loud base blared from large speakers shoved through the windows of one of the frat houses. A group of teens on their way home from the local high school stood on the edge of the green watching, wishing they were old enough to escape their parents, the girls tentatively preening for the attention of the college boys, while the boys admired the loosely-dressed college girls. Further away from the road there was a playful, coed football game in progress. Dennis admired the idyllic scene, enjoying the feel of Gina's soft, curvy body touching his.

"Isn't that Sharon, from high school?" Gina said, pointing in the direction of the football game. They shifted direction slightly and began to walk onto the grass. Gina immediately kicked off her sandals and left them behind, flexing her toes against the soft, cool grass. She let go of Dennis's hand briefly and did a quick cartwheel, giggled and then rejoined him. "This is so perfect! This is exactly what I imagined college would be like!' she said, hugging him and then letting him spin her around until she was too dizzy to stand up straight without his support.

"It doesn't get much better," he agreed, wondering whether to take the opportunity to kiss her right now or to wait for a more private time.

But Gina's attention was immediately diverted. 'Ooooh! Isn't Sharon good?" she said. Her friend had just caught a pass and was now running toward the goal until Chad Burke, one of the guys from the frat, caught up to her. Instead of tackling her he lifted her up onto his shoulders and ran the other way with her, depositing her behind the original scrimmage line and then holding her to the ground for a 'loss'.

"Hey! That was so mean!" Gina said, pouting.

"What do you mean? He was just fooling around. It's not exactly a serious game," Dennis said, wanting her to focus on him instead. 'Anyway, they're moving the line up to where she caught the ball anyway.

'That's not the point. He was showing off, making her feel small and weak, even though she's a really great athlete. You should see her play soccer. She's amazing.'

Dennis looked at the lithe, energetic Sharon, who had jumped off the ground, was brushing off the dirt on her shirt and alternately stamping her foot and glaring at Chad who had smugly crossed his arms across his formidable chest. She was talking to Bob Kohler, the quarterback, and clearly wanted another chance with the ball to score a touchdown, but he seemed unsure about it. They lined up for another play and Sharon moved opposite Chad.

'She has that look in her eye. She's going to do something to him. I know it!'

'Are you crazy? He'll flatten her if she tries to block him!'

Gina shook her head. She was leaning against Dennis and was playing with the muscles in his shoulder. 'No, he won't. She's too smart for that. You'll see.' She was getting excited and grabbed his camera, her finger accidentally pressing the button shifting the mode from personal portrait to landscape. 'You'll see,' she said, talking more rapidly. 'Oh, I gotta take a picture of this. You won't mind .... She's really quick, and she's stronger than you'd think. Just think what she could do if she were ... How does this .... Hey, that's cool!'

Before Dennis could say or do anything, she had snapped the picture. He felt as though he were swept up in a vortex. All around him everything was changing.

Sharon was lined up opposite Chad, one hand touching the ground, grinning, looking at him hungrily. He swallowed and pawed the dirt nervously. He flexed his muscles, readying himself for the inevitable impact, while Sharon casually traced a line in the dirt. Although they were the same height, her arm was at least a third thicker than his, and her biceps, pushing out the sleeves in her large t-shirt, were half again as large as his and pulsed impatiently and intimidatingly as she waited for Karla Swanson, the quarterback, to start the play.

"This is such a gas!" Gina said excitedly. "Imagine seeing Sharon playing football against boys!” she added more thoughtfully. “They'd never have allowed that in high school! Too dangerous for them, you know. But I guess at college they trust us to make our own rules. I love it already!"

She took her hand off Dennis’s shoulder and lifted him high off the ground, holdng him there effortlessly. Dennis looked down at her thick, bulging muscles, which, amazingly, weren't even getting a pump from bearing his weight. "What's the matter, Dennis, haven't you ever been lifted by a girl before?" she said, batting her eyes seductively.

"No ... I, well, of course," he stammered.

"Oh! You guys always DO like to make us think you've done EVerything already!"

"It's just ... you're so pretty. Um, especially from way up here," Dennis offered, thinking fast.

Gina smiled. "Hmmm. Well then. So, um, is THAT what has you tongue-tied? A girl can’t find anything to complain about there!"

There was a loud chorus of laughter. After Sharon had casually flattened him at the snap of the ball, Chad had quickly scrambled to his feet and had sprinted across the field to intercept the pass. It was all for naught, though, because Sharon just picked him up and carried him back down the field and across his own goal line for a safety while Chad struggled futilely to break her grip and still hold on to the football.

"That's so cute!" Gina said, lowering Dennis into a similar position and snuggling him against her very large and firm breasts. "I'm glad you don't want to get away like he does."

“Why would I?” he replied, eying the camera, which was still strapped around Gina’s neck, but was dangling inches from his fingers.

“You want it back? You want to take a picture too?” she asked.

Gina chuckled as Dennis blushed. Unaware of what just happened, he still had no concept of the power of the camera. Gina, however, was fully aware that her thoughts were transferred to the camera. The camera created a mental link to the person taking the picture and locked those thoughts in. In this case, Gina’s original thought of Sharon showing up the larger boy was quickly transformed into her thoughts of a world where all females were stronger and more muscular. And Gina could hardly contain her excitement when the world changed. All of history was altered and Gina was now a 6 foot 1 inch muscle girl. In fact, she was more muscular than average. Something she now wondered if she could alter. With the power of the camera, she could be the strongest and most muscular. But for the moment, she was happy to be living in the new world she had created.

Allowing Dennis to gain his bearings, she released her hug and he took a step back, gathering his breath. He also got a chance to give Gina another quick once over, admiring her athletic, muscular build. In the world they just left, the Gina in front of him would have been able to enter a bodybuilding contest with her physique. From her bare feet to her shorts, her legs were thick with muscle, yet were smooth and curvy. Her shirt was tight around her wide shoulders and hugged her lats and large, firm breasts down to her hips, hiding what Dennis imaged was a spectacular six pack. Dennis stared at her bicep for a moment longer as Gina popped her peak up and down for him, causing an erection to rise and his mouth to go dry. He shook his head and coughed out a response.

Dennis nodded weakly, no longer in command of the situation. And in this reality, he never was. Only Gina knew of the situation change. Looking around, Gina smiled as she saw the girls on campus match the boy’s heights, but outclass them in muscle mass. Even the short and nerdy girls were buffed up thanks to Gina. With everything so new, she had no desire to have Dennis change it back. At least not yet.

Musing over her options, Gina walked back to her sandals and slipped them back on. Dennis stayed put, waiting to take his lead from Gina. Gina was a still new the whole situation and it took her a moment to realize that Dennis was no longer going to make the next decision. Nodding her head, Gina walked back to Dennis and clasping his hand, pulled him forward.

“So, Dennis, anywhere you’d like to go? I’m still new to the campus.”

Before he could answer, a large, beautiful girl bound up to them. Dennis looked at her and blushed and Gina caught his apprehension when he gave her a quick squeeze.

“Hey Dennis. Got a new girlfriend?”

The girl gave Gina an almost dismissive glance. Gina’s eyes narrowed as she looked up toward a girl who was not only taller, but more muscular. She had to be 6 foot 4 and 300 pounds of muscle. Dennis looked at the ground and tried to release his hand from Gina, but she held him tight.

“Uh, no Rachel. Gina is someone I went to high school with. I was, uh, just showing her around campus.”

Gina was now frowning. She was surprised that Dennis would be so submissive and not even acknowledge their mutual attraction. Of course that was before she took the picture. Was Dennis somehow changed. Maintaining her grip even though Dennis gave his hand a quick pull, Gina watched as a smirk formed on Rachel’s face.

“Sure thing Dennis. I figured you weren’t into the smaller girls. I’ll see you at the club tonight.”

Rachel turned away and walked away, catching up to a group of equally large girls heading toward the student housing. Gina kept her eyes on the girls before she looked back at Dennis, who was still staring at the ground.

“What was that all about?”

Dennis looked away and sighed. “That was Rachel. She’s a defensive linewoman for our team. We’ve dated in the past. She never really broke up with me, even though she sees other guys.”

Gina grunted an acknowledgement. So with the roles reversed, some girls were as big a jerk as the boys once were. Perhaps this new reality wasn’t all it was cracked up to be.

Gripping the camera, Gina bit her lower lip. Or perhaps it just needed another twist. With a tug of sorrow for Dennis, Gina pulled the camera up and gave it some thought. Nodding her head at her decision, Gina decided to….

141111.content:
Gina decided to steer Dennis and toward a modern building in the middle of campus. "What's that," she asked, "the Science centre?"

Dennis laughed. "Are you kidding? That's where the English department is located. You know how they always get the most money for things. Science is way at the end of the campus, in probably the oldest building around." He shrugged. "It's just the way things are. You know, the biggest donors are the successful women, and writing and communications are what's important to them. Mostly guys like science, so it's just an afterthought."

Gina laughed. This was great! In the old world women's subject were always underfunded, but this world would be so much better! They neared the modern building with its bright shiny surfaces. "Let me take a picture of us in the reflection," she said. She looked at the two of them. There were just about the same height, but Gina was so much more muscular. Then she looked through the camera. Dennis came only up to her shoulder now, and even her arms were far thicker than his legs. Was that big enough, or would Rachel still think of her as a smaller girl? She didn't want to take any chances, and as she thought about it the picture in the camera shifted and she quickly snapped it.

Dennis craned his head higher, his lips almost trembling. He had been been dating Rachel on and off for the past year, whenever she had wanted him, but Gina was just spectacular. She was by far the biggest and strongest girl on the campus and made Rachel seem almost as weak as a guy! What a growth spurt Gina must have had during her last two years in high school! How he wished he could have been there to see it. He had never met any woman as tall or muscular as she was now. He imagined what her biceps must look like flexed, how they would rise and rise nearly forever. His heart pounded at the thought of the sheer power they must hold, and that wasn't the only thing in his body that was pounding. He was dizzy with the fantasy of her arms around him, with the strength to squeeze him into oblivion, but the love just to keep him safe.

He trembled again. What if Rachel found out? She would kill him, absolutely kill him, if she ever knew what he was thinking.

"What ARE you thinking, Dennis?" Gina said, bending slightly to draw closer to him. She put her arm around him and felt him fold into her, and then pull away slightly. "Is something wrong?"

"No. It's, uh, great being here with you, Gina. But I ... I have to tell you. It's Rachel. She's very jealous. She put a couple of guys in the hospital last year."

"Rachel! Don't worry about THAT little girl."

Dennis shook his head grimly. "She may be small to you, but she's at least twice as strong as I am. If she sees us together then as soon as she gets me alone she'll beat me up, and there's nothing I'd be able to do about it. Last year she nearly killed Dan Markel, and he's a black belt in karate. But she's so strong that none of his moves made a difference. And I don't know the first thing about self-defence."

"Well, I'll tell you what," Gina said, putting her large arm around Dennis and pulling him against her. Oh, she loved the way that felt! "I'm going to take care of this 'little' problem for you right now. Why don't we find Rachel and I'll make sure that she never bothers you again."

"That w-would be great. But how?"

Gina patted the camera with her free hand and started walking, while Dennis practically had to run to keep up. "Just leave it to me."

“Just leave it to me,” Gina said confidently, walking quickly toward the sports hall where Rachel was certain to be practicing with the rest of the football team. Dennis kept falling behind her and, to Gina’s amusement, kept breaking into a run to keep up. Had their positions been reversed Gina would have said something to make Dennis slow down, but other than reluctantly admitting his fear that Rachel would give him a beating if she caught him with Gina, he seemed too proud to admit that his smaller size put him at a disadvantage. Funny how the male ego was just about the same, even in a world where they were so much smaller and weaker than girls.

Are you sure you ... know what you’re doing?” Dennis asked, nearly out of breath. “She’s always in such great shape, and she really knows how to fight!”

Gina stopped. “Maybe. But don’t you think I have a great shape too?” She held out her arm and slowly flexed her biceps. Completely losing his train of thought, his mouth agape in wonder, Dennis watched her muscle rise higher and higher, developing into a broad, loaf-shaped mound with a thick vein snaking across the top. With an added push, Gina made a peak pop out of the center of the muscle. The vein throbbed, almost threateningly.

“That’s incredible!” Dennis said, finally closing his mouth. “You must be so incredibly strong. Can I ask ... how big is it? How much can you lift?”

Gina laughed and popped her muscle a few more times for him while putting a long finger gently on his check. “You boys! Isn’t what you always want to know! Well, a girl has to have a few mysteries left for you to find out, bit by bit!”

“Um, yeah, sure, Gina,” Dennis said, shrinking away, suddenly. “Errr, Rachel, hi!” he said, his voice rising. “Why aren’t you, uh, practicing?”

Rachel stood imposingly, her hands on her hips, not bothering to answer. “Every year it’s the same. There’s always an eruption of new muscle bimbos on campus! And then there are the little boys who follow them around .. until they remember their places.” She pointed her finger at a spot next to her shoes. “Here, boy! Now!”

Dennis moved obediently though reluctantly, to her side.

"Don't you see the mud on my shoe?" Rachel said. "You DO remenber how to use your little shirt, don't you?"

Dennis started to bend down on his knee.

“Stop it! You can’t talk to him like that!” Gina said, her voice sounding less commanding in reality than it had in her head. Rachel looked very strong, and even though she was a few inches smaller and less muscular than Gina was, she was still far larger than anyone Gina, her mind still in the 'old world' had ever seen before.

"Don't be stupid, girl. You may be big but I bet you don't dare risk getting your nose bloodied and broken." Gina flinched. "I thought so. Tell you what. You can be useful too." She put her hand on Dennis's head and pushed it down, while flexing her bicep. "Take a picture of us. If it's a good one maybe I'll let you keep your pretty face."

This was her chance! Gina held the camera up, but her hands were shaking. Rachel was so mean and she looked so strong!

"I'm waiting!" Rachel said, her muscle flexing larger.

Her muscles looked so hard. Gina concentrated, trying to keep her hands steady, trying to think of Rachel as small, soft and weak, but the image of Rachel's bulging muscles kept coming back to her. She couldn't stop thinking about how strong she must be, how skilled she must be in fighting, and how arrogant she was. She wasn't sure she liked this new world she had unintentionally created. Were all girls like this now that they were the stronger sex? She couldn't seem to control her thoughts and looked away from the camera

"What's wrong with you, girlie?" Rachel snarled, pushing Dennis down into the dirt. "Don't you know how to press a button? Do you want to see how far into the dirt I can press his face?" She turned her body slightly, the movement making her powerful chest seem to Gina even more prominent and more threatening. The image unseen by Gina, Rachel looked even stronger in the image on the camera. Her body seemed to shimmer with energy, with raw power, while Dennis was even smaller, cowering away from her.

"Oh!" Gina said, startled. Her fingers were trembling even more and the shutter snapped. A vortex of energy swirled around Rachel, and, with the camera on its landscape setting, around all the strongest and meanest girls in the world. When the vortex passed, Gina was still taller than Rachel but Gina's muscle size and tone had wilted, replaced by a lean, undernourished physique, while Dennis was even thinner, his half-starved body with only the build of a twelve year old. Around them, the university had vanished. Instead, a magnificent forty room house, Rachel's, loomed in front of them.

Meanwhile, Rachel glowed with unlimited strength, energy and vitality. She stood proud and erect, her bare arms bursting with rippling muscles, her perfect skin fragrant with perfumed oil, her mouth curled with the arrogant sneer of a member of a genetically superior ruling class. Her powerful, muscular body was draped in expensive silk fabrics and gold jewellery. Her foot rested on Dennis's neck.

"Imagine!" Rachel said, her voice booming. "Two slaves cavorting when they're supposed to be working! And what do you think the penalty for that would be?"

Gina gulped. What had she done? Too frightened to even think of another picture, she backed away, unfamiliar with a world she had inadvertently created.

Rachel lifted her foot off of Dennis’s neck. She reached down and gripping his loin cloth shorts and picked him up with one arm as though she were picking up a towel. Dennis rose up and with a flick of Rachel’s wrist, Dennis was tossed toward Gina. He landed with a thud and rolled a few times, stopping at Gina’s feet.

“You two can entertain me. You wanted to have sex. Let’s see it. And if you start to bore me, then I get to use you two for a sex toy. And that, you two worthless slaves, is something you are not likely to survive!”

Dennis rose slowly, clutching his neck and trying to breath. Gina bent down and tried to comfort him.

“Just relax Dennis, catch your breath. We can still get out of this.”

Rachel laughed. “You two aren’t going to be getting out of anything. Now get your clothes off and show me why you were away from the fields. I’d kill you right now, but if you two are compatible, you can produce more slaves for me. Or not. I do have plenty of slaves.”

Dennis, shaking from fear and pain, pushed Gina’s hand away and pulled off his clothes, looking at her with sadness and desire. Gina’s eyes welled up. He did love her. Now she could see that. Why was she so selfish? With his weak, fragile body now in front of her, he was going to need some help to have sex. Gina looked at herself, incredibly disappointed with her own frail physique. As she leaned down to remove her own clothes, the camera around her neck became visible. Trying to remain calm, Gina knew she would have to act fast if she was to correct this. But if she rushed it again, she might make things worse, if that were possible.

Before Gina could think up a plan, Rachel snarled.

“What is that around your neck, slave? I didn’t give you permission to have something like that!”

Gina stood back up, pulling the camera toward her face. Trying to buy a few seconds to create a coherent thought, Gina gulped. “Uh, no, no. This camera was to be used to take pictures of your magnificent body and belongings. Nothing more.”

Rachel frowned, holding her position. Gina let out a quick sigh. Now was her chance. No longer willing to tempt fate, she could only think about putting everything back. A do over. Transport to a place she’d been. The gymnasium they had just left, the park, the coffee shop? Pulling the camera up, Gina knew she would have to act fast, as Rachel was now stepping toward her.

“I think not, slave. Now give me that camera!”

Concentrating as best she could, Gina knew she had to take the picture now, or be forced to stay in this horrible reality. The problem was that even as Gina forced herself to imagine everything going back to normal, the thought of Rachel being strong and muscular remained in her mind. Gina, as a possible pledge, was walked into a back room to talk with the sorority president, leaving Dennis with the hung over girls and Oprah. Oof. "Why are you taking a picture of the TV?"

"Oh... sorry. Just playing around with my new camera." Which apparently wasn't so great at making a scene perfect. The TV was still showing Oprah.

"Today on the Oprah Winfrey show, a full hour with Kirstie Alley, and the fitness breakthrough that will change your life."

There was a commercial pause, and then Oprah came back on one of the girls turned the volume up.

"Like me, and so many of you out there, my guest today knows all about the struggle that modern American women have with their weight. The self-described 'fat actress' has been the subject of endless tabloid columns about her weight, and had a reality series revolving primarily on her efforts to lose that weight and get in shape. She's here today to show you the results of her efforts, and to introduce a health and fitness breakthrough that will change the world. Please welcome, Kirstie Alley!"

Kirstie Alley strode onto the stage wearing a loose fitting bathrobe. Dennis knew there would be a "ta-dah!" I'm wearing a bikini underneath, look at all the weight I lost moment coming. Strange, though, she really didn't look like she's lost a lot of weight under the robe.

"Easy girl!" Oprah laughed with her, and the audience joined in.

"I'm just so happy to be here!" she exclaimed in a bubbly voice.

The crowd settled down and Oprah started her interview.

"Kirstie, like me and millions of others, you've struggled with your weight. We all know how that is! But you're here today to tell us that something has changed."

"That's right, Oprah. We, as the women of this nation, have become obsessed with thin. Being skinny, it's the new holy grail. And the more we've tried to get skinny, the fatter and less fit we've gotten. It has to stop! We need to drop this obsession with weight and size."

"Instead of trying to lose what we are, I decided that we need to start reshaping it. This obsession with thin bypasses so many important things in life. What about health? What about fitness? What about functional strength? Thin people are weaklings!"

The crowd laughed. Back in the sorority common room, all the girls, seemed to be watching the TV with great attention. None of them was overweight, but they all struggled to keep their bodies looking their best.

"I came to this conclusion, that we had to get away from losing weight and go to gaining fitness several years back, and started working with some researchers at UCLA on a new supplement that would do just that. And I have great news! It's here!"

She stood up and put her hands on the robe.

"You want to see the results? Do you?" The crowd roared it's approval.

Waiting a few minutes for the crowd's approval to reach it's climax, she quickly tore open her robe and dropped it to the floor. Sure enough, as Dennis had predicted, she was in a bikini underneath. But he never would have guessed at the rest of it.

Underneath her robe, Kirstie Alley had the most muscular body Dennis had ever seen! She looked fantastic. The thick pillars of her thighs swept in to her relatively small knee joint, while cantaloupe sized calves clung to the back of her legs. Her waist was covered in a muscular narrow six-pack, which swept up to her impossibly wide shoulders. She flexed a massive bicep and smiled.

A gasp went through the crowd. They weren't sure what to make of this! A few started to tentatively cheer. Total silence descended over the sorority living room, as the girls, and Dennis, watched transfixed.

"My God, Kirstie, that's amazing!"

"I know! It feels amazing too, you have no idea. I've been fat and that's not fun. You're tired all the time, have no energy, and you look like hell. I've been thin too, and that's not much fun either. You're weak and depleted all the time. All you can do is think about what you're allowed to eat and what you can't. Let me tell you, this is so much better than either of those alternatives."

Dennis saw the girls in the room start nodding in agreement.

"I'm stronger and fitter than I've ever been. To say I have boundless energy now is such an understatement! And my sex drive?" she lowered her voice to a whisper, "through the roof!"

The crowd cheered wildly at that comment.

"But how did you do it? That had to take a lot of hard work in the gym, right?"

"Oh Oprah, no amount of gym time would have done this to me. It's all thanks to this new supplement I was talking about. It's a all natural compound that tells your body to convert your fat into muscle. Well, not all your fat. They designed it to specifically avoid the conversion of mammary tissue." She held her hands up to the giant breasts that remained perched firmly on her muscular chest. "Most women actually gain a cup size or so due to the expansion of their pectoral muscles. I went up two."

When I first tried the supplement I weighed 238 pounds, and after I tried it, I weighed 238 pounds. But instead of 238 pounds of flab, I was 238 pounds of strong sexy muscle!" She flexed again to make her point and the crowd cheered. She had won them over.

"I've actually lost a little weight since then, I was 212 this morning when I weighed myself. That's one of the side effects, all this muscle turns your body into a calorie burning machine! I eat anything and everything I want and still lose weight. Over time the muscle does tend to go away, and if you keep eating everything you want, the fat might start to come back, but the answer to that is simple enough. Just take another pill!"

"There's an old cliche that nothing tastes as good as being thin feels. Bullshit. Let me tell you, Oprah, feeling strong feels so much better than feeling thin ever did!"

Kirstie bent down to pick up Oprah and her chair with only her left hand. The cheers grew louder. She flexed her right bicep, then put the host down and took her seat.

"I'm sorry about that, I'm just so excited about this all!"

"That's understandable, Kirstie," Oprah replied with a nervous laugh, clearly a little flustered. She'd just been picked up as if she weighed nothing, that did something to a woman! She needed to get herself some of whatever it was that Kirstie was selling right away!

"With your permission, Oprah, I'd like to demonstrate for you. Does anyone from the audience want to try this process? It works in about 20 minutes, and I think it would be great if we could show you how it works during the rest of the show. Any volunteers?"

"We need to take a break, Kirstie. When we come back we'll get the audience's reaction to Kirstie's transformation, and we'll see if we can find a volunteer to undergo the same changes. Stay tuned!"

Dennis was stunned. The camera, did it do that? Was it possible? The sorority girls chattered excitedly back and forth.

14521.content:
"Welcome back to the Oprah Winfrey show. We're here today with Kirstie Alley, and if you're just joining us, she's undergone a remarkable transformation. Now I think it's fair to say that our studio audience is going crazy. Everyone has a question for Kirstie, and we're going to try to let a few people speak."

Oprah held the microphone out to a doughy looking woman in her mid forties.

"Kirstie, wow you look amazing! But, what if I don't want to look that ... extreme?"

"Well, you won't. You can't actually. I mean just looking at you, you weight what about 150 pounds, right? So if you took one of my pills you'd still weigh 150 pounds, but it would be 150 pounds of muscle. Which is buff, don't get me wrong. You'd be very buff and very strong, but I weigh like 60 pounds more, so you wouldn't be close to as big as me."

"Now if 150 pounds of muscle is too extreme for you, there's another option. All that muscle turns your body into a calorie burning machine. So you just have to eat a relatively healthy... I hate to use the word but diet. I'm not talking diet like you're thinking, just eat sensibly. And with all your new muscle, the weight will just melt off! Seriously, I mean like losing 5,6, 8 pounds a week! I need to eat like 5000 calories a day just to stay at the same weight!"

"So you take the pill, eat sensibly, and in a few weeks you're down to 130 pounds of muscle, which with your frame is sexy and sleek and toned, but not really bulky at all."

"But seriously. You could do that, but why would you want to? You'll probably do what every other woman who has tried the program did. Take the pill, and then want more muscle! I'm serious! You don't understand how addicting it is to be strong and muscular!"

Another woman came to the mic, a younger college aged girl.

"Are there any side-effects?"

"Well, obviously, you get more muscular and really strong. The muscle is really functional too, and flexible." Kirstie bent over and grabbed one of her ankles, then stood up and held it over her head.

"Let me tell you, I couldn't do that before! You get increased fitness too. I can run 20 miles without getting really tired. And strength. I can't quite lift up my car over my head. It's a Hummer. If it was a Prius or something, then no problem. Like I said the strength is really functional as well. Not just brute force, but, watch."

She bent backwards into a back bridge and walked over into a handstand. Then she picked up one of her hands and started doing one handed handstand pushups before springing up, flipping twice in the air and landing on her feet.

"I used to be a gymnast in grade school, but let me tell you, I've never been able to do that before! What else. Oh yeah, how could I forget. It makes you really really," she dropped her voice to a fake whisper, "Horny! I always want sex now! And orgasm every time. I can orgasm watching the NBA these days!" The crowd roared.

"The sex is fan-tas-tic too. Bad sex is awesome and good sex... will put you in a coma!"

Next was a young man, maybe in his early twenties. He was being encouraged by several of his friends.

"Look, I'm sorry, I know you're really proud of yourself and all, but that's just nasty. You look like a man."

A chorus of boos started to ripple through the audience, but Kirstie calmed them.

"No, wait. He's entitled to his opinion. I appreciate you sharing it with us."

"Craig." he responded when she paused. "My name is Craig Summers."

"Well, Mr. Summers, I've certainly heard that opinion before. Usually it's from men about your age in groups, like you seem to be. I wonder, can I get you to help me with something? Down here on the stage."

The crowd started to applaud, and Craig walked down to to where Kirstie stood on the stage. He was a good six inches taller than her, but she made him look puny.

"Sit down, Mr. Summers, over there please. I want you to help me demonstrate something to the women in the audience that may be afraid that a lot of people will think like you did. I want to show them that people, especially young men in groups, don't always say what they mean."

Kirstie walked closer to the young man until she was nearly straddling him, like a stripper doing a lap dance.

"Now, Mr. Summers." Her voice dropped an octave into a throaty, sexy stage whisper.

"You're about 24 or so, is that right?"

"Twenty three." he responded, looking very nervous.

"I'm fifty-nine. Did you know that? I'm almost sixty years old. So old enough to be your mother, even your grandmother. It's really not surprisng that you don't find me ... sexually... attractive..." she paused to emphasize each word.

"Is it?"

She put one finger in her mouth and bit it lightly, pulling it out slowly and running it down her lower lip. The entire audience could feel waves of sexual energy emanating from Kirstie, all focused on the man in front of her. The audience was totally hushed.

"I mean, how could you be..." she took her finger and ran it down her neck to her collarbone

"Attracted..." she plunged her finger between her massive breasts.

"To an old woman..." tracing their outline.

"Like me?" she drew her finger down her rock hard abdominal, skipping it over each ab, before finally tucking it into her bikini bottom.

"Let me ask you again." She ran her finger across her chest this time, from one nipple to the other flicking each one lightly and leaving it swelling to poke through her bikini top. Then she took a step back from the chair, leaving Craig sitting in it, his face red, and his mouth open, slack jawed. Kirstie took a step back and flexed her biceps. Massive mounds of muscle swelled all over he body making her look bigger than ever.

"Are you attracted to this body?"

He muttered something inaudible.

"What's that, speak up."

"YES! yes oh my god yes!"

She smiled and turned back to the audience.

"You see ladies, men get intimidated, but we've found that they can't resist the appeal of a muscular body. Some of them don't like to admit it, I guess they're afraid their friends will think they're gay or something, but they love this. I'm not sure if that's a side effect of the treatment or not, but you'll notice that you have a superhuman sex appeal. Look at poor Craig, he's almost in a trance over there!"

"Now in case you're worried that being irresistible to men will get you in trouble, don't be. Let me show you something else." She went back to where she'd dropped her robe earlier, and bent over to take something from it. It was a key. She walked back over to Craig who was still sitting in his chair staring at her.

"Mr. Harris, you've been a wonderful young man. I want to take you back stage to my dressing room and do things you can't imaging to you. Would you like that, Mr. Harris? Would you like to go back to my dressing room and worship my body?"

"Y... yes."

"Say it."

"I would like to go back to your dressing room and worship your giant muscular body." He sounded almost like he was hypnotized.

"Excellent! You just need to take this key from my hand, and you can meet me back there. And I'll give you pleasure like you've never imagined before. But only if you can take the key from my hand." She closed her fingers slowly over the key.

Craig stood up and walked over to her. There was a noticeable wet spot in his pants, and his erection was clearly tenting out his pants.

"Come here my boy, and get the key."

He closed his hand around hers and tried to open it, but her fingers didn't move.

"What's wrong, Mr. Harris. Just take the key."

He brought up a second hand and strained to make her open up her fist.

"He doesn't have a chance. My fingers are stronger than his whole body. That's the kind of power I'm talking about here ladies."

Oprah jumped in at this point.

"A few years ago you might have heard a little story about me giving away cars." The audience laughed. "Well today I'm going to be giving away something so much more valuable. Each one of you is going home with a bottle of 100 of Kirstie Alley's magical muscle pills!"

The audience screamed, and cut to commercial.

Back in the sorority the girls were talking.

"This show was taped like a week ago. We need to go find someone who was at that show and get some of those pills from them!"

145211.content:
The three women made their way towards the door, one of them grabbing a set of keys off of a table, when Dennis noticed something a little odd and decided to intervene.

"Wait a minute," he called out to them.

"What?" the one closest to the door said, her hand almost on the knob. "Something wrong?" Dennis looked around at the Sorority Sisters and none of them were in any condition to drive. The one with the keys looked a little bleary eyed and the shortest of the three looked like she could pass out at any moment. She actually had to put her hand on one of her friend's shoulders in order to stay upright.

"Look, let me drive you," Dennis said. "I know this town like the back of my hand."

"Hey, buddy, just because you...whoa." The one with the keys turned to face Dennis and the whole room began to spin. She clutched the side of her head until the feeling passed. "Maybe...Maybe you're right." She gave the keys to Dennis.

Just then, Gina and the Sorority President re-emerged. "You four going somewhere?" the President asked.

"These three are still a little hungover from last night, so I offered to take them where they need to go," Dennis answered. "Want to come, Gina?"

"I'm actually still talking to Bethany here, but you four have fun."

You and the three Sorority Sisters make it outside. Next...
145211.title: The girls go looking for some magic muscle pills

Handed out several different colored pills to the girls
14522.content:
As the commercials continued, Dennis looked at the girls talking about how they could get a hold of this seemingly magical supplement. So did Dennis. But he also had other ideas. If a seemingly innocent thought of improving the show he were watching turned into Kristie Alley, a woman clearly outside his fantasies, becoming some type of super woman, what could he do with a little focus?

As the show came back on and a middle age woman named Laura stood on the stage, Dennis sniffed. OK, she was 5 foot 11 and 300 pounds. It was clear in his mind that this could change, but so what? His only interest was in the supplement Kristie was pushing and to get it to some of the women around him. And then Gina too. So as the show droned on for a few minutes, with Laura’s measurements being taken for reference, Dennis began to think about other TV shows. He also looked at the girls around him. Why wait for the supplement to be mentioned and then to try and get some? If one picture caused this, why couldn’t he have a more direct affect?

Suppose these party girls grew big, strong muscles right here, right now. Thinking about things, he wondered if he could imagine that he had a bottle of the supplement, or one that worked even better. Getting up and turning toward an empty corner, Dennis thought about a bottle of magic muscle pills being on the table in front of him. With a nervous look back at the girls focused on the Oprah show, Dennis looked through the lens of the camera and jerked back as sure enough, he saw a bottle on the table. Looking away from the camera for a moment, the table was once again bare.

Smiling at the power he now felt he possessed, he tried his best to focus on the pills. What they would do, how fast they would work, that they would only work on women. Fat would melt away, muscles would grow from nothing, beauty would be amplified, strength…. He chewed his tongue for a moment. Should the pills give the girls strength proportional to their muscle growth, or should they be able to grow even stronger? Perhaps he could have many types of pills in the bottle allowing for different results. All with the same basic premise, larger muscles, greater strength, enhanced beauty and curves, but with different proportions. One pill could create a world class fitness girl, the next, nothing short of a She-Hulk powerhouse.

Seeing as the camera had filled in his random thought with the Oprah show, he wasn’t worried about his somewhat vague thoughts about the pills. After all, what could go wrong?

Smiling to himself at his flawless logic being run by his smaller head, Dennis once again pulled the camera up and snapped the picture. When he pulled the camera down, sure enough, there was a bottle of pills with the words UCLA Fitness Supplement and some words about dosage. Walking over to the bottle and picking it up, Dennis grunted slightly. He hadn’t thought about dosage. After all, wasn’t one pill going to be enough?

Shrugging his shoulders and still confident that he was about to create a campus full of muscle filled gorgeous girls frolicking around, lifting cars and flexing their scantily clad bodies, he turned back toward the girls on the couch, eager to test the pills out.

Moving back toward the TV he watched as Laura was sent to the back with instructions while Kristie and Oprah stayed out the couch. It was at this point that Kristie pulled out a bottle with a label that looked just like the one Dennis was holding. The hair rose on the back of Dennis’s neck at the sight. He knew he had his in.

Looking at the girls leaning toward the screen, Dennis scanned the room again, finally realizing that he recognized one girl from a Greek History class, Stephanie. He knew what a hot girl she was, and the fact that she was really out of his league. They had studied together a few times in a group at the library, so he hoped she would recognize him.

“Um, sorry to interrupt ladies, but if you’re looking to get your hands on some of those pills, perhaps I can help.”

The girls all turned their heads, looking at him with skeptical eyes. Dennis gulped under the scrutiny, as the beautiful girls could be intimidating. One girl, Tracy, shot him a crooked smile.

“What makes you think we want to look like that?”

Dennis gulped again, but it was Stephanie who came to his rescue. “Oh come ON, Tracy. Are you kidding? Who wouldn’t want a magic pill to melt the fat away and give you muscle tone. I for one would kill for that chance. Besides, it would be cool to be really strong.”

Tracy rolled her eyes. “This has to be some kind of trick. There is no such thing.”

Dennis pulled the pills out, figuring it was now or never. “I just happen to have some right here.”

The girls eyes all widened. Stephanie shot a look at the TV, which had an inset shot of the pills while Kristie and Oprah talked. She then moved closer to Dennis, staring at the bottle. It was then she recognized him.

“Dennis? From Greek History?”

Dennis blushed, taken aback by her sudden advance on him and her surprised statements. He tried to play it cool.

“Uh, yeah. Stephanie?”

Still staring more at the bottle than him, Stephanie nodded her head. “Yeah. Where did you get these pills?”

Dennis froze for a moment. He hadn’t thought he would need a back story. Thinking quickly, he made something up. After all, who was going to check?

“My cousin is a pharmacist and let me have a bottle. He was interested to see how well it worked and asked me to bring some to college.”

Now feeling he had his in and a bit of control for the first time, he paused as his smile grew and his fantasies blossomed.

“I WAS going to head over to the jock sorority or perhaps the gamer girls. You know, if you girls weren’t interested.”

Stephanie stood back up and smiled at Dennis. Even hung over and with no make-up she was very pretty. Her long blonde hair was a bit of mess and her green eyes had a bit of red, but she was still made Dennis pause. At 5 foot 9 and with a bit of extra fat, her boobs were none the less nicely sized and her shape was curvy, apparent even with a large sweatshirt and a pair of sweat pants. Dennis could only imagine that she wasn’t wearing a bra and had on a thong. Bouncing up and down on her bare feet she held her smile on Dennis.

“Don’t be silly. You know we are interested. I, for one, would love to try one.”

Dennis tried to remain cool, but Stephanie was more than he could handle, even in her slightly hung over state.

“Well. OK. If you really want to.”

Stephanie giggled now as Dennis fiddled with the child proof cap. Popping it opened he looked up only to see not just Stephanie, but Tracy and the third girl, Juliet, as well. It was at that point that Gina came back out with the Sorority president, Allie. Gina looked surprised with the girls all huddled around Dennis.

“Dennis? What’s going on?”

Dennis’s pulse raced, as he felt surprised and nervous. He had nearly forgotten about Gina and now he felt like he was betraying her. Realizing he had more verbal dancing to perform, he forced a smile. He also looked into the bottle, seeing pills of different size and shape.

“Oh, Gina. I was just offering the girls some diet supplements given to me by my pharmacist cousin. The pills were just being discussed on Oprah.”

The other girls were giving Gina the once over and Allie looked on with interest. Stephanie sighed, clearly impatient.

“Look, you can give your girlfriend a pill later. Right now I’d like to try one out.”

Gina stepped closer, not quite sure what to make of things, including the ‘girlfriend’ comment. One thing she was sure of, she didn’t like this girl next to Dennis.

Dennis could see Gina was a bit agitated, but he was already committed to Stephanie in his mind. After all, there were plenty of pills for everyone.

So as the girls all stood around him, staring expectantly, Dennis finally….

1453.content:
Being a small campus, and given that the administration was against the standard greek-style fraternity and sorority, there were no houses for the major sorority's on campus, but instead common rooms in the dorms where they could meet and socialize between or after classes - all of them still had to find their own housing on campus. This, the administration hoped, would prevent the hazing and rituals that came with the greek life.

Dennis led Gina through the door of a sorority he hoped she'd fit into because it was the one sorority whose members liked Dennis and who would talk him up to her. It was the Rho Phi Gamma sorority, or RPG for short.

The RPGs were not the party girls - at least, not in the sense that term was normally used. They in fact loved to party, it was the best way to complete a quest online and offline was dull without at least 5 or 6 participants.

The RPGs were not the beauty queens of the school - though on paper they were stunning, and online many of them were flawless.

The RPGs were not the athletes of the school - though few others could boast the daredevil feats that these girls had achieved in dungeoneering and dragonslaying.

The RPGs were the girl geeks of the school - which to Dennis meant intelligent, funny and friendly. They included their share of girls who proved the hot nerd principal, but also those girls who proved the brace face principal. Mostly they were somewhere between the two. And they all new Dennis Masters, who the affectionately called DM.

Many of them immediately hated Gina when she walked through the door because it was clear that Dennis was into her and they had held hoped of Dennis being into them. This included all 5 female members of the LARP society, currently in costume for the years first outing. It also included Casey, the tom boy mechanic who could tear apart and put together anything that didn't involve microcircuitry but couldn't figure out the workings of a long term relationship. Finally it include Deirdre, the game master of the girls only game nights and number one party member for most of Dennis' games - who wanted to show off the new props she'd bought for a supers LARP she was starting with the LARP group.

The girls saw Dennis' new camera and all had ideas of what he could do with it.

A super-muscular Gina, now looking unimpressed at Casey's bicep.
14532.content:
Casey was the first one to walk up to the pair. Giving a quick eye to Gina, she began talking to Dennis.

"So Dennis, that new girl seems pretty fit. How about you take a picture of us comparing biceps?" she bluntly stated.

This took Dennis off balance somewhat. He had always liked Casey more because of her slightly larger muscles, and she wasn't afraid to show em off. Sometimes he wondered if she had figured out his own secret. Her statement seemed to prove that. Dennis was about to turn around to ask Gina if she wanted to, but Casey had already started talking to her.

"So uhh..."
"Gina."
"Right...Gina. Anyways, you seem pretty fit. Do you work out?" said Casey.
"A little. Just enough to stay fit. I used to do it more." replied Gina.
"I see." Casey sarcastically remarked, "Well then...how about we have Dennis over there take a picture of us comparing biceps."

During this exchange, Dennis had been thinking how wonderful it would be to see these two really muscular and flexing just for him... Then again, Casey did seem to realize what Dennis liked, while Gina still had an innocent 'girl next door' thing going on, which was cute back when he was in high school, but maybe now he should look beyond just girls like that. He was broken from his thoughts by Casey clearing her throat loudly in his direction.

Casey and Gina had already gotten into position when Dennis actually looked at them. Their biceps flexed and waiting. As he was about to bring the camera up, Casey stated, "Oh wait, just a sec. I haven't actually TENSED my arm." To this she actually did do just that, and her bicep pressed upward a little more, but now it was clear that she was bigger than Gina. She began to tense and un-tense her arm, teasing Dennis. It was apparent to him that she knew he liked muscles on women, and this whole show was for him.

He brought the camera up, and was amazed by what he saw. But before he could put a thought to it, he snapped the picture. Lowering the camera, he saw in reality, the same thing he had just seen in the camera.

What was it, that he saw?
14532.title: A 'comparison' shot.

145321.content:
Casey had figured out that Dennis liked the muscular girls last year. It took a bit of detective work, but he always seem to hang out too much around the athletic girl’s sorority, even though they rarely talked to him. And when she was working on rebuilding an engine last year, she spied him staring at her biceps as she strained to tighten some nuts. She had built up a crush on Dennis during this time and had figured out the way to win him over. And it was by doing something she liked to do.

So this summer, Casey took to the weights in earnest. She also let her hair grow out, since she had picked up that nugget of Dennis’s likes during an RPG all-nighter. Now her long black hair was kept well washed and conditioned and blow dried, flowing around her pretty features. Casey wasn’t much into make-up, but for Dennis she applied a bit of base and some lipstick. She had even put together the outfit she figured he’d like. A tight muscle shirt, a nice push up bra and athletic shorts. Only her hiking boots remained from her normal butch outfit from last year. The outfit change wasn’t a bad thing anyway since she was tired of getting hit on by the lesbian crowd.

And now the months of lifting were going to pay off. Her biceps were the main focus since that seemed to be where Dennis’s eyes always moved to when looking at buff chicks. Casey was pretty proud of her arms. Weeks and weeks of curls had sculpted a pair of baseball sized biceps that would be the envy of any athletic woman.

And then he shows up with this pretty young thing. Casey had given her a hard look over. She must have been a cheerleader. Probably still wanted to be one. Casey had pulled her shoulders back and thrust out her chest as Dennis approached. Standing 5 foot 10, she was pretty tall. Taller than that blonde bimbo anyway. Cutting to the chase, she wanted to show off her biceps and Dennis and this other girl where quick to comply. The fact that Dennis was eager was no surprise. The fact that Gina did was actually a blessing in disguise as she would get to outshine her with her pumped up arms.

As Dennis stared at the girls he was in shock. He had always liked Casey as a friend and had not really thought about her much differently unless she was flexing up her biceps around him. But now! Holy cow, did she look hot. The long full dark hair and smiling face were great. The outfit showed off a girl who had spent some serious time in the gym. And her biceps! Oh wow, they were pretty good last year, but now they popped like a pumped up fitness star.

As he pulled the camera up, a new fantasy focused in front of him. Casey must have been working out. And it looked like her bicep was growing bigger when she flexed. What if… What if she could grow bigger muscles just by flexing them. Holy cow! Bigger and stronger muscles with every tense. And harder too. Now that would be awesome.

With this thought firmly implanted in his subconscious, he looked into the camera, watching this totally smoking Casey bob her bicep up and down. Gina may have been better looking and had a curvier build, but right now his thoughts were focused on Casey. And when he snapped the picture, Casey sucked in a hard breath.

Casey froze for a moment as a wave of energy welled within her. She had never felt anything like it. It was if she had just completed a work out and felt totally pumped. Gina released her flex and giggled, not really paying attention to the sparks seeming to fly between Dennis and Casey. Deirdre noticed this however and looking out for her sorority sister, quickly pulled Gina aside, offering her more details of college life from a woman’s perspective.

This left Casey to let out a breath as the high energy feeling subsided. Releasing her flex she smiled coyly at Dennis.

“Liked that did you?”

Dennis blushed, still trying to hide what Casey already knew. “Uh, yeah I guess. I mean, you look great Casey. Have you, uh, been working out.”

Casey smirked at Dennis and grabbed his wrist. “Come on you, let’s get a little privacy.”

Dennis glanced over at Gina, who caught his eye, nodded and waved as Deirdre continued to keep Gina occupied. With another yank from Casey, Dennis stumbled forward and soon found himself in Casey’s Spartan room. A bed and desk were on one side and a small bench and weight set were on the other. Nodding her head toward the weights, she smiled at Dennis.

“Does that answer your question?”

Yelping out an “OK!” Dennis took the picture and ….

15.content:
Dennis had plenty of things to do, but he was stressed out, he had a couple of tests to study for, and they weren't going to be easy. He decided to head to the student lounge and relax for the first time all week.

He ordered a drink and moved to an outside seat. The weather was pretty nice and the scenery was pleasant. And there were plenty of people walking by and sitting around to entertain him. Looking down at the camera, Dennis fiddled with the controls and finally turned it on, looking to try it out a bit. He aimed the camera around him, checking out the focus. He stopped at a table that head been there since he started college. It was old and the legs weren’t all that steady. He had always wished they would fix the damn thing. And then looking through the camera a weird thing happened. The picture on the camera showed a newer, nicer table. He turned his head around the camera and saw that the table was the same.

How could this be? He looked back at the picture and as he thought about the table turning red, the table on the camera turned red. Raising his eyebrows, Dennis snapped the picture and when he pulled the camera down a red table sat there. Dennis jerked from surprise and looked around. Did anyone else notice the table had changed? Nobody around him seemed to care or give any reaction. Dennis got up and walked over to the table, giving it a long look. He walked over to a group he had been staring at.

The girl was very pretty with big boobs. She was obviously the girl friend of the frat boy next to her. It was pretty obvious he treated her like crap. He was currently ignoring her, but earlier he was ordering her around and she seemed to shrink back as if he had hit her before. He was talking to his buddies when Dennis walked up.

“Uh, excuse me, but could I ask you a question?”

The big muscled frat boy, Jared, looked up annoyed. “What?”

Dennis almost took a step back. What a jerk. “That table next to you. Was it always red?”

Jared looked at Dennis like he was nuts. The girl next to him, Katherine, gave him more of a concerned look.

“Yes, that table has always been red. Why?”

Grunting an acknowledgement, Dennis nodded his head. “No reason. Sorry to bother you.”

With that, Dennis sat back down and looked at the camera again. Perfect pictures huh? He pointed it at a passing guy with a receding hairline and thought about giving him some hair and with the snap of his camera, his head sprouted hair. The man paused, reached up to touch the tingling he had felt on his scalp and became wide eyed. He turned around to see if anyone noticed anything and walked quickly to the bathroom.

“Hmmm. That guy seemed to notice the change. I guess I need to try it out some more.”

And he did. Dennis changed hair color and clothing, carefully watching the reaction. When the person walking by suddenly had a dog on a leash, the new owner paused, looked at the happy dog, shook his head and continued on. Dennis still hadn’t figured out if people knew about the changes or not. It seemed to be related to the circumstance. But not only could he change things, but he could apparently create things with a thought and the snap of his camera. What an incredible power.

Having experimented enough, Dennis was now ready to try out some real fantasies.

As he sat there, watching people go by, he was tapped on the shoulder. It was Wendy, a girl who he hadn't seen since 8th grade. She had moved when her dad got a new job in Chicago.

"Dennis? Is that you?" Wendy asked, and Dennis turned around. Wendy had always been pretty, he guessed, but he really didn't pay any attention to it when he saw her last.

"Huh? Yah, I'm Dennis. Do I know you?" Dennis had no idea who this very pretty young lady he was looking at was, but she was definitely what he would refer to as "stunning". She was about 6'0 tall, with a very slim waist and a very generous bust, which looked huge even on her very tall body.

"Oh, I'm Wendy, remember? We were in school together until 8th grade? Who woulda thunk we'd end up in the same college?" Wendy seemed very cheerful. "I don't know many people here, I just transferred from Northwestern. I was looking for some people to hang out with. You wanna hang out for a while?"

"Sure" Dennis replied.

"Where do you wanna go then?" Wendy asked.

Dennis looked at her and smiled. “Have a seat. I’m about to try out my new camera. The day is about to get a whole lot better.”

Wendy looked at him funny as that last line sounded almost like a mad scientist about to bring a monster to life. And for Dennis, his mind was already on overdrive. So many fantasies. So many girls. So many women. So much strength and muscle to wish for.

He could change Wendy into one of his muscle fantasy girls. He could transfer the size of that frat boy to his girlfriend. He could bring comic book girls to life and give them the muscles they deserve. TV show stars or movie stars too. And they could be as strong and as muscular as he could imagine. Or perhaps start the same and then add muscle so Dennis could watch the growth and here them describe the experience. To watch Wonder Woman grow bigger and bigger and muscles and then take on the rest of the Justice League was a long running dream of his.

Formulating his first full thought, he raised the camera up and smiled. This was going to be awesome. Or so he thought.

When they were in school together, Wendy didn't attract much attention. She was tall for her age, but clumsy and awkward. Braces, glasses, and having her hair always in a ponytail didn't help any. Dennis and her always got along but he always had a fantasy in the back of his mind. Her black hair and tall stature reminded him of one of his favorite heroines. And occasionally he would fantasize about her twirling, like Lynda Carter from the TV show, into Wonder Woman. She definitely had the beauty part. Now all she needed was the power.

And with that thought he snapped the picture.

Wendy started to feel dizzy.

"Oh, Dennis. I don't feel so well, could you walk me over to the restrooms?" she asked.

Dennis, now concerned, helped his friend out of her seat. As they made their way past the crowds, she doubled over in pain just outside the restroom doors.

Her breathing became more rapid and beads of sweat formed on her forehead. Her gray slacks began to get tighter as the muscles in her legs began to grow. The threads along the sides began to pop one by one as the power flowed through her. The black blouse tightened around her generous bosom and then, one by one, the buttons popped off as her powerful pectorals increased in size. Wendy's biceps bulged underneath the silk and then exploded through the material with a loud rip. Her instinctive flexing destroyed more her her sleeves and her wide, muscular back caused a long rip down the center.

As the growth stopped, Wendy stood erect, her tattered clothing covering bits of her new amazonian body. Her raven colored hair seemed more radiant and her azure eyes, more piercing.

"How, why, did this happen?"

"Uh, I'm not sure" Dennis replied.

Wendy examined herself and her ruined attire.

"Now what do I do? I can't very well walk around like this."

"Well, you look a lot like Wonder Woman...maybe you can get her costume by...um...twirling?"

Remembering the old TV show from reruns, Wendy decided that while the idea might be crazy, but it's not any crazier than being transformed into a six and a half foot tall powerhouse. So she gave it a whirl, literally, and the scraps of clothing flew off and a bright light enveloped her. A brief moment later, Wendy stood in all her glory. The red and white high-heeled boots accentuated her strong legs. The star spangled briefs looked painted on her shapely rear end. And the red and gold top looked like it could barely contain her large breasts while showing off her bronzed, muscular upper body. The silver bracelets, golden tiara, and famous Lasso of Truth, finished off her heroic ensemble. Wendy, or perhaps more appropriately Wonder Wendy, flexed her biceps, causing 15 inches of super-powered muscle to erupt from her arm. She then noticed Dennis smiling wide at the display.

"Dennis you seem rather calm about this whole situation, are you sure you don't know why this happened to me?" she asked sternly.

"Nope" he replied.

"Well..." Wendy said.

1511.content:
“Then you won’t mind if I wrap the lasso around you just to make sure, hmmmm?”

Dennis’s happy demeanor quickly changed to shock. “Well I don’t think that’s necessary.”

Wendy was now smiling widely and without any further discussion quickly tied the lasso around Dennis, who froze where he stood. Wendy looked at him thoughtfully.

“Now, I’ll ask you again. Do you know why this is happened to me?”

Dennis, now under the power of the very item he wished into existence, was compelled to answer. “Yes. The camera in my pocket is magical. When you look through the camera, whatever you are thinking about happens once you take the picture.”

Wonder Wendy snickered. “So you wanted me to be Wonder Woman, huh?”

Dennis nodded sheepishly. Wendy leaned a bit closer.

“And you wanted me to be super strong and have these big muscles too?”

Dennis nodded again, this time with an added blush.

“So this must be a fantasy of yours. So what else is in your little fantasy? Do we have sex? Do I fly around for you? Flex my mighty muscles? Toss semi trucks around?”

Dennis groaned as he tried to hold back his thoughts. “Ahhhh. Well, yes. Sex is always part of the fantasy. Letting me feel your muscles as you flex them is another. I also dream about your muscles grow even bigger and for you to become even stronger. To watch you beat Superman in an arm wrestle or to out lift Captain Marvel, to flex bigger muscles than the Hulk or to crush Darkseid.”

Wendy shushed Dennis and leaned forward, pressing her index finger against Dennis’s lips to stop his wild stream of consciousness. He stopped talking and remained rigid, still under her control. Wendy smirked and removed the lasso. She placed it back on her hip and flexed up right arm into a perfect ball of muscle, enjoying the feeling of strength coursing through her muscles.

“Well then, with so many ideas to try out, we had better get going. Now that I’m apparently as strong as Wonder Woman, I’m guessing bending a steel bar isn’t even worth the effort. But if you’d like these muscles to grow even bigger and stronger, perhaps we need some point of reference. Anything you’d like me to lift?”

Dennis tried to remain calm. All the blood rushed out of his head and he felt woozy. Not only had he just let loose with some of his greatest fantasies, but one of them was talking to him and giving him the green light to move forward. He could barely contain his excitement.

“Well how about lifting weights against Superman and Captain Marvel? I could wish up a graviton weight set with a digital display. Or maybe see about flexing your muscles against the Hulk? Or how about fighting Thor and Juggernaut?”

Wonder Wendy smiled broadly. “Well…..”

15111.content:
Dennis didn't want to change Wendy any more than he already had at the moment - so he was careful to take the next photo without her in frame. Finding an empty room he aimed the camera and took a shot. Before his and Wendy's eyes the room was transformed into a scientific wonder. Aparatus of all sorts lined the walls, every surface was made of a cold slate blue metal - and in the center of the room sat a bench press stand build of metals outside the realm of human understanding - and upon the stand sat a single metal bar. On either side of the bar stood the most powerful mortals in the world.

At one end, Superman - the Man of Steel. An alien being possessed of strength far beyond that of humans - or by some measuring, all of humanity as a total.

At the other end, Captain Marvel - Earth's Mightiest Mortal, the strength of a demigod and the stamina of a titan made him stand above mere mortals - sometimes as far as, sometimes farther than his counterpart.

"So, Diana, this is the photographer you got for this competition. He hardly looks a professional.", Superman said.

"Gee, Superman, no need to be so hard on the boy - I think he'll do just swell.", Captain Marvel responded in his booming, resonant, wise voice - though strangely spiced with child like choice of phrase.

Of course, Dennis knew both of these men's secrets and thus knew that Superman could surely spot a professional photographer being a journalist, and the child like language of Captain Marvel was because - despite the wisdom of Solomon, he was in fact merely the young Billy Batson most of the time.

"Yep - Dennis is going to be my full time photographer from now on - his photo's bring out the best in me.", Wendy replied. "So, how are we doing this?"

"Well, you'll go first - and lift your maximum - then I'll go, then the Captain, each pushing our maximum. After that we each get one more attempt to outlift the others."

Wendy smiled and whispered to Dennis "No pictures on this first round."

Dennis watched the sexy superheroine slink over to the bench press bar and begin to raise it - her muscles lifting the deceptively small object with aparent strain.

"OK Captain, start cranking it up until she's at her max.", Superman said. In response, Captain Marvel began to increase the weight. Dennis looked to the digital readout - eyes darting back and forth between it and Wendy - wait, did they call her Diana? - and her feat of strength.

The weight was already at 100 tons by the time he looked to it - and he was having increasing trouble trying to conceal the hard on pulsing in his pants.

When he saw how quickly the numbers climbed he nearly came and passed out. 100 tons became 100 kilotons, which gave way to 100 megatons and 100 gigatons. Wendy was now lifting 100 billion tons and it looked like she had more left. The machine, able to judge the strain on it's user began to increase the weight by more fine precision - maxing her out at an awe inspiring 900 gigatons! Her muscles looked bigger than ever as they were absurdly pumped from the effort. Dennis knew right away he'd made the unconscious choice to go with a pre-crisis Wonder Woman rather than the post crisis version, as that level of strength was far beyond the moder Wonder Woman.

As Wendy reracked the weight, Superman stepped to the bar and began his lift where she had left off. The weight measurement jumped rapidly again - to 10 terratons - 10 trillion tons of weight were being held aloft by the less than appropriately named Man of Steel - he should be the man of... well, whatever metal it was that supported his effort now in the form of the bar and the bench. As his strain increased the weight edged up to 30 terratons. At that weight it leveled out as Superman's arms trembled and returned the bar to it's rack. Over 30 times stronger than Wonder Woman, he had established his superiority.

When the Captain took his place and began his lift at the established 30 terratons Dennis was shocked, but then he remembered how much he liked the character and his depiction in such great stories as Kingdom Come and realized his thoughts had made the Captain the stronger of the two men - though not by the same margin as there was between Wonder Woman and Superman - as the Captain brought the weight up to 100 terratons.

"Gee boys, you really inspire me.", Wendy flirted with the two super beings. "Why I just might have to double my efforts - or maybe redouble them to keep up. Why heck, I suppose I should put all the effort in the world into this next lift. Dennis, please take a picture of this lift - I think it will be the climax of our display."

Dennis just hoped he didn't climax - again - before he could snap this picture.

"And boys - I think you'd better hold onto the bar for this one.", she said going into position.

"Don't worry Diana, the bar won't give you more than you can lift.", Captain Marvel replied.

"Oh, it's not that I'm worried about. You see boys, I've been keeping my strength in reserve - I need you boys to hold the weight down as best you can, because I don't think this thing can go high enough to challenge the muscles I'm about to show off."

Dennis gulped as he raised the camera - that thought hammered into his brain by Superman's statement, "Diana, we haven't even found an upper limit to this device yet, I think you're being boastful."

"Humor me."

And sure enough, in Dennis view finder he saw Superman and Captain Marvel pushing down on the bar - and he snapped the picture...

Walking around the corner, into view was none other than Supergirl. But just like Dennis wanted, she was in her civilian clothes. For Dennis had thought about the silver age/bronze age Supergirl. The one who was attending college. A 19 year old Linda Lee Danvers. With a dark wig and fake glasses she looked just like any college girl book worm. Nearing the table, Linda smiled and waved at Dennis. He smiled back and returned the wave. When he took the picture he had made sure that Linda was a close friend and the only one at college who knew she was really Supergirl.

He had no idea of the other events that would now play out with this single picture however. The brunt of the DC universe was now melding with this reality, mixing Silver Age and Modern Age themes from Dennis’s thoughts.

Linda walked up to the table and Dennis got up.

“Linda! Nice to see you. How are you doing?”

Linda furrowed her brow. “Not that well. Can we talk. Somewhere private.”

Dennis turned toward Wendy. “I’m sorry Wendy. Linda and I had planned to meet here. Can we catch up some other time?”

Wendy, realizing that she had given Dennis no previous warning, nodded her head and smiled. “Sure Dennis. I’ll catch up with you later.”

Wendy walked away and Dennis turned back toward Linda. “So what’s the problem?” Dennis had to hold in a smile. He knew exactly what the problem was. He had created it to start this little fantasy come to life. But he wanted to see how it played out now that he had set the events in motion.

Linda bit her lower lip. “Follow me. We need to talk somewhere else.”

Dennis nodded his head and followed her away from the crowd and toward what looked like a shed used to store lawn equipment. Only it was not what it appeared to be. Linda stepped up to a hidden scanner and with a metallic click, the door opened. They both stepped inside and the door closed behind them. The entire room then descended down a few hundred feet below and the door opened up to Supergirl’s mini version of her cousin’s Fortress of Solitude. More precisely, it was closer to Batman’s cave set up for the purpose of monitoring activities around the area and also call into the various Leagues that Supergirl aligned herself to on occasion.

Once they were in the main room Linda quickly became Supergirl, causing Dennis to gasp. The outfit she had on was the mix he had been dreaming about. She stood at 5 foot 9 and had on the standard calf high red boots with the gold trim. The red skirt was definitely a mini with blue tights below. The midriff was bare and her stomach sported a nice fitness level six pack. Her thick crop top was a mirror of Superman’s, blue with the red and gold S, only it covered her upper body up just passed her shoulders, exposing arms that looked quite normal, but could flex up a small bicep under stress. Her breasts were full, but right sized for her body. The red cape behind her seemed to flap around even without a breeze. Her facial beauty was as stunning as he had imagined, with her long blonde hair, piercing blue eyes and overall Nordic features. How she could hide all this with her Linda cover was amazing, but knowing how things worked with comic books, it shouldn’t have been all that surprising.

Looking a bit relieved for the moment, Supergirl smiled at the open jawed Dennis.

“I always feel much better getting into the super outfit. And you seem to like it too.”

Dennis let out a deep sigh and then returned her smile. “So what’s the problem?”

Supergirl let out her own sigh. “It’s Superman. He still treats me like a little girl. He’s blocking my admission to the Justice League because he says I’m not ready.”

She grunted angrily. “Not ready? Who is he kidding? I’ve been doing this hero thing for years. I’ve trained with the Amazons. I’ve got the strength of a Krytonian!”

Dennis nodded. “A GIRL Krytonian?”

Supergirl scowled and her eyes turned red. “What did you say?”

Dennis pushed his arms out. Good grief, this fantasy would be no good if she fried him. “No, no! I meant, that’s what HE thinks. He’s the big bad powerful Superman with all the muscles and strength. You’re just the little girl.”

Supergirl turned in huff and smacked her fist into her hand with a boom that shook the room. Dennis had to reach out to the wall for support. “Careful, Kara, you wouldn’t want to give away this location.”

Supergirl turned back to face him, ignoring his comment. “So is that what you think too? Is that what EVERYBODY thinks?”

Dennis looked at her carefully. “Of course that’s not what I think. I’ve seen you in action. You’re awesome. But I suppose the press does look at you a bit different than Superman.”

Looking down at the ground in thought, she crinkled her nose and looked up with a frustrated look. “Then what am I supposed to do about it?”

Could that translate to proportion strength increases back in the yellow sun-light? It may take a few weeks, but even under the red sun, her Krytonian genes allowed for super human regenerative abilities, so weeks would be years for anyone else. Or there was the direct approach. Head to Superman’s fortress and use his super weights to work out at super speed, building up her muscles in no time. Of course the camera could make it much quicker too.

Reaching out, he put his hand on her shoulder and she reached up to gently touch his hand. Dennis looked in her troubled eyes. “So how would you like to prove them all wrong by building up your body.”

Smiling weakly, she bit her lip nervously. “You mean like Powergirl?”

Dennis smiled. “Oh, much more than that. What if you could have bigger muscles and greater strength that Superman.”

She smiled back with excitement in her eyes. “You think I could really do that?”

Dennis nodded his head gently. “Sure. And this is how we can do it.”

And his excitement grew at the next thought. "Then you can show Superman who the real super one is!"
